instruction: Grading IELTS Writing Task 2 based on 4 criteria: coherence and cohesion, lexical resource, grammatical range, and task achievement.
input:
'Question': '[2:12 pm, 27/03/2024] ℋᎯℳℐⅅ: Today more people are overweight than ever before. What are the primary causes of this? What are the main effects of this epidemic?

[2:12 pm, 27/03/2024] 🇵 Ə 🇳 🇦 🇭:' 
 'Text': 'Nowadays the majority of people suffer from overweight, and this situation has some reasons, also effects. In this essay, I will discuss the main reason behind  obesity and propose some possible suggestions that can be helped.First of all, the technology has improved day by day, and it can provide individuals with various services which make their life easier. For example, they can buy their needs from online shopping sites, therefore they should not go anywhere, also they do not do exercise, and it leads to increase their cholesterol level and blood pressure. Furthermore, today, in the contemporary world, we face with different pandemic such as covid-19, and people should stay at their home, they cannot go out. They become lazy persons by working from their home, it leads them to be overweight.

Overweight has some effects on people’s life. One of them is health problems . To be more specific, if they do not do exercise enough, they cannot manage their healthy conditions, and their cholesterol level and blood pressure can increase which can be reason for important disease in the future. At the same time, this situation can decrease their productivity in their work. They cannot do some task because of their weight.

In conclusion, improving of the technology creates lazy people in contemporary world. Its reasons can be different, but this trend result in overweight, and it can change our modern life directly. The majority of overweight people deal with some health issues, also it can decline productivity of their work.'

instruction: Grading IELTS Writing Task 2 based on 4 criteria: coherence and cohesion, lexical resource, grammatical range, and task achievement.
input:
'Question': 'Nowadays many people choose to be self- employed, rather than to work for a company or organisation. 

Why might be the case ? 

What could be the disadvantage?' 
 'Text': 'It is a fact that nowadays many people choose to be self-employed rather that to work for a company or organisation due to several reasons. People have different approaches to this topic and this essay will shed light on both disadvanrages and possible consuquences.

   On the one hand, individuals give preference to be self-employed due to several reasons which have crucial impact on overall well-being and quality of life. First of all,since individuals consider their work statement as self-employed there can not be any kind of limitation in terms of sleep hours, work schedule.For example, being self-employed release people from rudimentary job requestments such as working at least eight hours or forced restriction of sleep hours.Additionally, employees choose independancy rather than compelling high standarts that can lead to leaving work environment for the sake of independence.

   On the other hand, this popular work option can pave the way for less disiplined society in many aspects because of various reasons. First of all, althouhg people desire and choose self-employmet, social work environments such as companies or organisations keep them disiplined due to tangible rules and work more meticolously.For instance, making own decisions about work schedule or standarts do not cause better life quality compared to one's work life which authorized by large campany which always take great and logical steps for not only a person but also for whole team.

   To sum up, despite the fact that self-employment became popular each passing day, the negative cansuquences for both society and individuals should take into consideration.'

instruction: Grading IELTS Writing Task 2 based on 4 criteria: coherence and cohesion, lexical resource, grammatical range, and task achievement.
input:
'Question': 'More and more people today are drinking sugar-based drinks. What are the reasons for this? What are the solutions?' 
 'Text': 'Today fastpacing genration mostly teenagers everytimes they tends to try sugar based drinks.And due to the fact that the concequences are apposite for teenagers health.In the forthcoming paragraph I will explain and discuss why peoples likes sugar - based drinks and what are the solution for not to use these kind of drinks in their life.

Mostly people like teenagers try new things like to have added new drinks in their daily life like sugar based drinks which may leads peoples life in very big problem in future aspects.Because in starting age of a young adults are trying new they drinks more sugar based drinks then the suger level in their body  increses day by day due to this high level of sugar body sufferd with high blood pressure.To avoid this kind of dieases people live halthy life instead of drinks high or extra based drinks.people can added bitter gourd to maintain the sugar level in blood.

On the other aspects in recent genration who drinks these kind of drinks are mostly teenager and younger genration reason behind this is because of toxic enviornment.Younger genration are looked other people to drink so they wish to try so teacher and parents are try to guid and tell them to that not good for health and in schools need to add a seprate subject to knowledge about healthy life.In addition government need to apply high tax on these sugar based company drinks to not to supply to much.

To sum up with,One of the scientest said if anything we drinks or we eat today it will help to developed or may effects on our body and mind.So,our today genration is very usefull for our upcoming future peoples need to avoid extra based drinks in their dailylife'

instruction: Grading IELTS Writing Task 2 based on 4 criteria: coherence and cohesion, lexical resource, grammatical range, and task achievement.
input:
'Question': 'Globalization has both advantages and disadvantages.

Discuss both and give youe opinion ?' 
 'Text': 'In the globalization era,  technology has been rapidly growth because some academists develop technology based on science. Personally, I believe that  science can support to enhance people's activities. So, I totally agree with this statement. 

First and foremost, science can create an abundance of technologies for working and transportation. In addition, some people believe that some assignments can faster using technology like a laptop or smartphone than using basic science like calculating big data using paper which is wasting time to write in  paper. Furthermore, some technologies use modern science or machine learning because it is more quickly. For instance, some students at universities who using cloud computing to process big data more effectively and more efficiently to calculate or break down a lot of data. 

On the other reason, some people use science for developing transportation such as bridges, railways, and other infrastructures to support people's lives. Moreover, scientists still enhance public transportation qualities which are highway designs and real-time updates using a geospatial approach. I believe that scientists can tackle some obstacles using science. For example, academists still developing new algorithms to enhance accuracy of the global positioning such as traffic jams and estimation . As a result, all communities can monitor  conditions in some places using a geospatial approach. 

To conclude,  science has an abundance benefits for supporting daily activities such as working and studying. I believe that  science can enhance our quality which using technology or transportation.'

instruction: Grading IELTS Writing Task 2 based on 4 criteria: coherence and cohesion, lexical resource, grammatical range, and task achievement.
input:
'Question': 'Some people feel that we should protect all wild animals. Other people think that only some wild animals should be protected. Discuss both points of view and give your opinon.' 
 'Text': 'Protecting wild animals is a debated topic, with some advocating for the preservation of all species while others suggest a more selective approach. I believe a balanced strategy is necessary with protecting a few of them.

Those in favor of saving all animals argue that each species contributes to the ecosystems's health. For example, predators are essential for maintain herbivore instead become a pest. By limiting the number of the population, it can save the other species especially plants. By preserving all species, we ensure the stability and resilience of ecosystems, which benefits humans and wildlife.

On the other hand, advocates for a more selective approach focus on endangered species or those crucial to the ecosystem's balance. For instance, efforts to protect the black rhinoceros have focused on combating poaching and habitat loss, as this species is critically endangered. By concentrating resources on species facing the greatest threat, we can make a significant difference in their survival prospects and prevent their extinction.

In conclusion, while both approaches have their merits, I believe that focusing on protecting endangered species and those crucial to ecosystem balance is more practical and effective. By prioritizing these species, we can allocate resources more efficiently and have a greater impact on conservation efforts.'

instruction: Grading IELTS Writing Task 2 based on 4 criteria: coherence and cohesion, lexical resource, grammatical range, and task achievement.
input:
'Question': 'According to observations, some animal species have become extinct or endangered in recent decades.

What are reasons behind this tendency?

What effects it may have on ecosystem in general?' 
 'Text': 'Recently, a growing number of animal species have been harmed and become on the verge of extinction. There are numerous underlying causes that I am going to delve deeper into, in order to reveal its possible effects.

In the light of climate change, inappropriate weather patterns carry out disastrous impacts on animals’ well-being, directly. Moreover, wild fires have also significant role, that not only destroy their habitats, but also kill immense number of animals. In today’s world, people are more likely to use leather products, which results in pointless destruction of animals. There is another cogent reason that should be mentioned, with the growing of water pollution and deforestation, habitats of animal species become unlivable.

When it comes to the effects, one of the severe implications of loss of animal species is loss of biodiversity, which will cause serious changes on food chain. Initially, extinction of animal’s can disrupt the balance of ecosystem and deteriorate not only animal’s life but also other plant and insect species’ life. In our ecosystem, all species are strong bond with each other, and vanishing of animal species will destroy invaluable harmony of our ecosystem. Additionally, loss of animal species can cause food deficit for animals and human beings.

In conclusion, animal extinction is accelerated by various factors, including deforestation and pollution, which encourages noxious ramifications and undesirable impacts on our ecosystem as well as quality of our life.'

instruction: Grading IELTS Writing Task 2 based on 4 criteria: coherence and cohesion, lexical resource, grammatical range, and task achievement.
input:
'Question': 'A person’s worth nowadays seems to be judged according to social status and material possessions. Old-fashioned values, such as honour, kindness and trust, no longer seem important.

Give reasons for your answer and include any relevant examples from your own knowledge or experience.' 
 'Text': 'Nowadays, a person's worth seems to be judged according to their status and material possessions. Most of people do not pay attention for the old-fashioned values, such as trust, kindness etc. In my opinion, most of people maybe really are in search of friends who have much money to make profits from them. Also, it is really important to have good treats of your character for sure. In my mind, it is hard to live in the society in our time because you literally can not trust anyone.

First of all, it always was a truth that any person can betray you to get any benefit that this person needs. A big quantity of people are ready to betray each other to gain more money or get new information. Most of the huge companies work with this method, highly educated and rich people will not trust anyone while they have an enormous company and large amount of money. There are so many scammers and bad guys who will hunt for these people and search some weaknesses to break them. For instance, recently I saw one businessman who said that he would not trust anyone while he had one of the biggest arbitrage companies in Ukraine.

On the other hand, people should have good treats of character, especially, for their reputation. In my mind, it is the most important thing that person can ever have. Also, they can make more friends. In my mind, people often feel what a person is like from the inside. Likewise, the best treats of character are that people could have been reliable, honest and the person must be the man of his word.

To sum up, it is hardly to trust somebody so people need to be careful while telling some important information to others. In my mind, you can trust only your relatives.'

instruction: Grading IELTS Writing Task 2 based on 4 criteria: coherence and cohesion, lexical resource, grammatical range, and task achievement.
input:
'Question': 'Some people think that success in life comes from hard work and determination while other think that there are more important factors such as money and appearance. Discuss both view and give your opinion.' 
 'Text': 'Appearance and money are regarded as a crucial part of success,  while there are some oppostion concern that determination and hardwork are way more better. This writer is choosing the sides of hardwork and passion and give some evidence to this.

 Money and appearance, which are important to a successful career or work, as they offer the opportunity on jobs and wealth. With the nice appearance, people can gain the first impression in interviews so  that they get more attention and chance to be hired, and, if people do have money, loads of money, they don not have to worry about lacking of profits. With these states, people can involve in lots of work and jobs which require a huge advantages from these. For example, if you are handsome and have alots of money, you can be a singer.

 Turning to the passion and hardwork, which come in both, and be concerned by people as an important states of sucess. With out the hardwork and dedication, people can not have motivation to work on their trip to success, they can not even gain experience because they show no interest in what they are doing. This consquence in that the passion and hardwork are very important for such success. Taking Pagani for example, a very determined business man finding his own car company and be refered as the most famous car dealer and maker in the world for his dedication and passionate process.

 Taking all point into account, money and appearance which are important to a successful career or work but above of that is passion and hardwork are a crucial part of sucess as it gives people the motivation in work for sure.'

instruction: Grading IELTS Writing Task 2 based on 4 criteria: coherence and cohesion, lexical resource, grammatical range, and task achievement.
input:
'Question': 'Some people think that success in life comes from hard work and determination, while others thinks that there are more importance factors such as many and appearance. Discuss both views and give your opinion?' 
 'Text': 'It is often said that hard working and determination will bring individuals successful life whereas a part of people believes that there are many priority elements such as currency and the good look of appearance. The author of this essay thought that it is not importance for people to over appreciate cash or appearance and people need to concentrate on resolution.

It must be considered a huge amount of teenagers around the world tend to follow the outlook of beauty. The young groups said that there are opening opportunities for people who want to work successfully as a super start. Moreover, some people suppose that many high-quality position can be used money to buy and do not need to learn much. Conversely, some citizens try to work very hard for their job such as learn carefully about the work, have good attitude to gain an impress salary and turn into wealthy. In my point of view that people in society must try to work to get more and more success in life. This happen can bring people turn in a millionaire one day. If people do not stop to learn and cultivate, success will visit.

instruction: Grading IELTS Writing Task 2 based on 4 criteria: coherence and cohesion, lexical resource, grammatical range, and task achievement.
input:
'Question': 'Some people think that success in life comes from hard work and determination, while others think that there are more important factors such as money and appearance. Discuss both view and give your own opinion.' 
 'Text': 'In the modern decades, many individuals believe make the life success is come from hardworking and determination while others believe that finance and appearance are a crucial part of become success. This writer will agree with the statements and lay out reasoning below.

On the one hand, it must be considered that experience from working and determination is an essential part of achieving success in human life. In the other words, when people work in the workplace they will possess experience from learning and experiencing and they know what to do in the social life. Take students in the USA as an example, they study and work in school in working field so that they have an acknowledge about that factor and make them flexible in working areas.

On the other hand, many people believe finance and appearance will play an important part in reaching success. It must be recognized that people who having money would study in a better school or higher education of the factors which they study about, moreover, having appearance would help them getting the job easier because of attracting people in advertisement. For example, many famous actors become success because they use money to create their own companies and use appearance to attract people who want become like them.

In conclusion, hardworking and determination and possessing money and appearance would help them success in the way of becoming success. However, people who study hard and have determination will easily to reach the goal of their lives because of experiencing than the finance and appearance problems.'

instruction: Grading IELTS Writing Task 2 based on 4 criteria: coherence and cohesion, lexical resource, grammatical range, and task achievement.
input:
'Question': 'New technologies have changed the way children spend their free time. Do advantages of this outweigh disadvantages. Give reasons for answer and include any relevant examples from your own knowledge or experience' 
 'Text': 'Nowadays, we are living in the modern era where new technologies has been changing our life  day by day.  Especially in the way children spend their free time. And from my point of view, I believe that this situation bring more harm than good.

Firstly, it is undeniable that with the exploration of technology our life become more and more convenient. For example, with the development of some social networking sites such as Facebooke, Instagram on Twitter we are able te contact and interact with each other easily. Moreover, through some application for study, student can study online at home instead of going to school, and increase their study productivity. However, new technologies still have bright site and dark site, especially in the way children spend their free time.Because children are not mature to have the self-control and know the way to use these technologies correctly. 

Secondly, many children now have tend to stay at home and be addicted to technologies instead of participating some outdoor activities. As a result, this situation had brought to children some troubles about physical and mental health. For example, without the exercise children become more and more vulnerable and get diseases easily. Moreover, with technologies,students have tend to depend on it. For instance, they use google or some artificial intelligence application to find out the answer instead of work by themselve, and lead to bad result of studying.

In conclusion, new technologies have both advantages and disadvantages. However, for children who are not mature enough I believe it brings more harm than good. Therefore, it is necessary for parents and schools to take part in teaching and monitoring students as well as children to teach them how to use it effectively and take advantage of it.'

instruction: Grading IELTS Writing Task 2 based on 4 criteria: coherence and cohesion, lexical resource, grammatical range, and task achievement.
input:
'Question': 'As a result of deforestation and illegal hunting, many animal species are becoming endangered and some  are even facing extinction. Do you think it is important to protect animals? What can be done to deal with this problem?' 
 'Text': 'Irrefutably, forests have a huge influence on people’s lives virtually all around the world. Considering this scenario, some people believe that deforestation and hunting should  permit the people, however others believe that,  it is  part of our society to keep alive our ecosystem. I completely  agree with the point that statement. This essay will examine the above-given argument about deforestation and illegal hunting before reaching any staunch conclusion.

Predominantly, there are myriads of benefits of forests and animals. Initially, forests give us wood where we use it for house hold purposes. Another reason is that animal maintains ecosystem on the earth. For example, humans use wood to lit the fire and  cook  food, heat-up their houses in the winter season and manufacture  furniture for their uses,personally as-well-as commercially. Therefore, it is clearly evident that forests and animals are beneficial for our community.

On the other hand, strict laws and public awareness. The Government must impose hard rules on cutting jungles and prohibit to kill animals. In addition, the administration should organise campaigns and explain to the people, about the dangers on the  enviromnet  and public. For instance, in India, there is strict regulation for everyone, ban imposed on cutt  jungles and kill animals, such as the  tiger. As a consequence, it is apparent that forests and animals are part of our generation as they are living with us millions of years.

Putting in a nutshell, following the analysis of trees, they  give shelters and food to humankinds and animals. Further, it is clear that animal maintains ecosystem and forests keep our surroundings with full of oxygen. However, some time forests are spread on agriculture soil and animal damage farmers crops, but it is not major issue instead to kill someone and cut  trees, which may leads to the  global warming.'

instruction: Grading IELTS Writing Task 2 based on 4 criteria: coherence and cohesion, lexical resource, grammatical range, and task achievement.
input:
'Question': 'In the future,nobody will buy printed paper or books because they will be able to read everything they want online without paying. To what extent do you agree or disagree?' 
 'Text': 'I know ,there are different opinion between the people but I think both of them are good because

paper and book have nostalgia when we are touch a book feel good another side the world is expending ever day , hour and second so we have to follow that because we will have an easier life and we can prevent the destruction of forests so we need a world with forests and I agree use a online book .

We know a book is the best friend for human and create a new vision for man but for make a book we

have to cut a lot of tree and destroy a forest .most of the people cant buy a book or paying just middle class and prosperous class can use it . I can say it was not available to everyone so it was a social problem .but now technology solve this difficulty.

instruction: Grading IELTS Writing Task 2 based on 4 criteria: coherence and cohesion, lexical resource, grammatical range, and task achievement.
input:
'Question': 'Visits to and from the UK changed from 1979 to 1999' 
 'Text': 'The line graph explains how the number of visits to and from the UK changed from 1979 to 1999, and the bar graph shows the most popular countries visited by UK residents in 1999. 

At the beginning, visits abroad by UK residents showed a slight increase of almost 10 million from 1979 to 1984. This was followed by constant growth through the years reaching a significant rise of over 50 million in 1999. Despite both trends starting at around 10 million visits to the UK in 1979 there is a significant difference between them. In contrast to visits abroad by UK residents, visits to the UK by overseas residents reached a lower growth of almost 30 million in 1999.

The bar graph shows that the most popular country to visit was France with around 11 million in 1999. In contrast to France, Turkey had the lowest visits with around 2 million in the same year.'

instruction: Grading IELTS Writing Task 2 based on 4 criteria: coherence and cohesion, lexical resource, grammatical range, and task achievement.
input:
'Question': 'Some people think that ambition is essential fo success. To what extend do you agree?' 
 'Text': 'Being an ambitious person and having a strong desire to succeed is one of the main feelings that help us to be stronger. Some people argue that it is crucial to achieve their goals. However, I partially agree with this statement because there are many other skills, feelings and thoughts required to accomplish our goals. 

Firstly, it is well-known that ambition could help our motivation to remain intact daily and help us to stay focused on our targets, which is explained from psychological and biological sources owing to our flight or fight response being switched on. For example, a lot of neurotransmitters are released, such as dopamine and adrenaline. 

However, there are other attributes that are vital for achieving our dreams such as discipline, consistency, and hard work as well as opportunities should be leveraged. For example, Cristiano Ronaldo was raised in impoverished circumstances, however, nowadays is one of the best soccer players worldwide. All of this related to long routines of training and keep practicing by fixing errors. On the other hand, Miley Cyrus won The Grammys's Prize by performing its best song \'

instruction: Grading IELTS Writing Task 2 based on 4 criteria: coherence and cohesion, lexical resource, grammatical range, and task achievement.
input:
'Question': 'In developing countries, children in rural communities have less access to education. Some people believe that the problem can be solved by providing more schools and teachers, while other think that the problem can be solved by providing computers and internet access. Discuss both views and give your own opinion.' 
 'Text': 'Several individuals hold the vision that it is  better to play team sports, whereas other human beings consider that a personal type of physical activity is valuable. In this essay, I will discuss both points of view and in the end, my individual position will be shown.

On the one hand, solo motor activities are that some people believe have significant values. Obviously, when a human has to carry responsibilities for itself it is a more efficient way to reach success in a field like sport. For instance, athletes such as swimmers are not able to worry about others and there are no common aims with others. Furthermore, there may not come up with different positions, and as a result they can bring off their purposes. However, they are by themselves and they will not be given any support, since solo athletes do not have a union. Consequently, athletes' excellent achievements are able to decrease.

On the other hand, team sports may have  numerous  benefits, owing to the fact that when sportsmen face problems other members can share  their advice and motivate each other. Nevertheless, being in the group may delay relevance results, due to there being lots of opinions that ought to be paid attention 

In my view, both of them can have their advantages, and at the same time disadvantages. Personal sports are more productive in the short term, while team physical activities are more valuable in the long term.'

instruction: Grading IELTS Writing Task 2 based on 4 criteria: coherence and cohesion, lexical resource, grammatical range, and task achievement.
input:
'Question': 'Shopping is now one of the most popular forms of leisure activity in many countries for young adults.

What do you think is the reason for this?

Is this a positive or negative development?' 
 'Text': 'Nowadays, adolescents in some nations love shopping, which is the most renowned activity in their spare time. In my opinion, the two main reasonsof this negative trend are: their habit of most young adults since childhood with their parents or relatives, that as they get older, they should not expend too much money, and the other reason is the comfortable spot of spending leisure time.

    One main reason why many youngsters spend their free time going shopping is due to their parents' habits. In metropolitan cities, shops and entertainment places like theaters and games zones are available in big malls, so they will choose a mall to visit with their family. The parents can shop, and their children can play at game zones. This habit will grow with age until youth, which will be detrimental to their future. Adolescents should save their money and not spend too much because it can be more beneficial for a reserve fund if something wrong happens unexpectedly.

     The world has become sultrier than before due to global warming; consequently, many public places, like shopping centers or malls, should have some electronic tools, such as substantial air conditioners, to make visitors convenient. Therefore, youngsters really enjoy shopping for several hours, and if they do it frequently, it will become their habit. [My suggestion for this paragraph is to start emphasizing that shopping is negative.

    To conclude, the shopping trend is negative for the younger generation, as a lousy tradition, because it is wasting time and money. It is better to do something beneficial in leisure time and prepare for their future.'

instruction: Grading IELTS Writing Task 2 based on 4 criteria: coherence and cohesion, lexical resource, grammatical range, and task achievement.
input:
'Question': 'Government investment in the arts, such as music and theatre, is a waste of money. Governments must invest this money in public services instead.

To what extent do you agree with this statement?' 
 'Text': 'In the contemporary epoch, it is observed that executives are spending alot of money in the arts, like music, dance and theatre. A part of society believe that this is wastage of precious currency of the nation because rulers should foucs more on the development of health care, schools and trasport amenities, along with this theatre might act as a wrong trajectory for the posterity growth, while skeptics do not agree on this. I wholeheartedly agree with this matrimonial. Thus, I will explicate the extrapolates for my viewpoint in the upcoming paragraphs.

To begin the most predominant reason that the government should invest more in the public services.  If the administration will be place their investment arrow on schools, hospitals and trasportation facilities, this can help them to increase the overall GDP of their nation because the people who are leaving below the poverty line, they put relentless pressure on the economy as a result nations gross demostic product shows a downfall in the internaional market. For instance, on the basis of reports of 2019 6.7% of Indian population is living below poverty line. Therefore, the rulers can invest money to fulfil their basic necessities to alleviate poverty and improve their countries condition at global level, rather than wasting this money on faciltating arts like theatres.

Another major reason to support this view is that music and theatres might act as hindrance in the growth process of the generation because they may get attracted towards the television stars and this may put the pernicious effect on the academics of learners. A prime example for this is seen in Indian culture, peers ask money from their guardians for their tution fee, but they utilise that money for watching movies. This exacerbates their education level. Thus, government should not permote the art, instead they can spend money to bring pedagogical approach of teaching in schools to enchance the interest of learners in books. Thus, learning institutes can be a best allocation of governmental money.

To conclude, as per the statements mentioned above, there are money fields that needs investment likes schools and hospitals. Hence, government should focus on these rather than art and this can help the rulers to improve their income as well.'

instruction: Grading IELTS Writing Task 2 based on 4 criteria: coherence and cohesion, lexical resource, grammatical range, and task achievement.
input:
'Question': 'Some people think that success in life comes from hard work and determination, while others think that there are more important factors such as money and appearence. Discuss both views and give your opinion.' 
 'Text': 'Many individuals think that successful people are hard-working and determined, whereas somes believe that finance and look are more crucial. This writer agree the former idea because hard-working people can apply for a well-paid job, while someone say that the latter is true due to job requirement. 

To begin, the main reason why some people say successful people work hard because they can get job which have a good salary. By way of explaination, students which have high scores in exams can go to good university and when students graduate, they can get a wonderful job which give them much money. Moreover,we often listen to successful businessmen,how they started their careers which they do not admire,but ended up being so wealthy and relating this to their dedication and a lot of determination until they reach their passion.

Futhermore, there are some who believe money is everything in life,it could make you famous and well known. In addition to being wealthy,being good looking also leads you to the same. Although it is somehow correct ,in my opinion, there is much less chance of this.In views of this,we rarely see a wealthy human who reaches their goal without being dedicated or whereas without working brutally before reaching this.Besides,being affluent without working will eventually lead to failure.For example,a businessman will never succeed only by being rich.

To sum up,everything mentioned and both views are all keys to reach what you want.But in my opinion,it is all about passion and dedication rather than being good looking without working hard to succeed.'

instruction: Grading IELTS Writing Task 2 based on 4 criteria: coherence and cohesion, lexical resource, grammatical range, and task achievement.
input:
'Question': 'Some people think that success in life comes from hard work and determination, while others think that there are more important factors such as money and appearance. Discuss both views and give your own opinion.' 
 'Text': 'One of the most successful way in achieving goals is hard-working and making an effort, whereas some people assume that money and physical appearance play an essential role in success. From my point of view, although there are various advantages in using possessions and external qualities to be successful, it should be recognized that trying one’s best is more crucial to acquire aims in life.

On the one hand, both possessions and physical appearance are the best profitable for some business in market places. To illustrate this point, take a number of renowned brands such as Dior and Chanel as a prime example where unusual products, as well as professional models are altered to meet the demands of customers all over the world. As a result, their products not only increase the popularity about high-fashioned consumption but also become an icon in commercial places. Besides, these companies would gain a profitable income which help them to promote and succeed in career.

On the other hand, I believe that due to working hard and trying our best in a particular aim, people have a chance to achieve their goals and become more successful in life. This means that the more time and effort they spend on enriching knowledge, as well as characteristic, the more accomplishment they acquire. Besides, although stress-related problems are an integral part which could exist at any time to prevent people from their achievements, they would plan everything more carefully and keep working until success. For instance, gaining the 100% scholarship of Harvard University is a difficult goal for almost all the exchange students. However, if learners know how to make a suitable plan and have a sustainable determination, they could have an opportunity to attend to this college.

In conclusion, while money and physical appearance play an essential role in the way to success, it should be recognized that working hard and determination are more crucial to accomplish many important achievements. Therefore, making a plan should be appreciated which is added to the way of success.'

instruction: Grading IELTS Writing Task 2 based on 4 criteria: coherence and cohesion, lexical resource, grammatical range, and task achievement.
input:
'Question': 'In many countries, people are now living longer than ever before. Some people say an ageing population creates problems for governments. Other people think there are benefits if society has more elderly people. 

To what extent do the advantages of having an ageing population outweigh the disadvantages' 
 'Text': 'In recent years, It has become far more normal for lots of countries to show longer life expectancy than in the past. While there may have some benefits for current society , this can contribute to having exact problems for the governments, I think.

 On the one hand, having lots of elderly people in our community which has not a wish to learn own history is maybe useful. It might be important to prevent the community from the loss of imagination about Marvels in history, whose heroism still provokes young generation to be the leader of their society. Another one is to maintain customs pass from the past until now as a result of saying historical events. There are unchanged traditions such as being respectful to ancestors in where old people live more.

 Inspite of the arguments above, this hard situation brings several problems to the government. Firstly, living more longer has a detrimental contribution to the rate of unemployment in most of countries, which comes at the expenses of increasing the expenditure of these provisions. Some european countries now are, for example, experiencing that the proportion of individuals who have lost their abilities to work on increase compared to having babies. They are facing precise difficulty related to the lack of work force. Moreover, the second issue is to being given money that the government can invest in  other more useful sectors such as education and military to develop the intelligence and safety of countries for people are in retirement. It is evident that dividing investment into this people category comes at a huge cost to countries budget. As an outcome, this condition can compose the government not to focus on other more primary fields anymore. These two examples can easily explain why this case has many dismerits more than merits.

 In conclusion, ageing population seems to have some important sides such as being aware of historical characters and protecting from losing customs for our generation, rising unemployed people degree and having reduction in countries budget can be underpinned as unresolved issues to the government.'

instruction: Grading IELTS Writing Task 2 based on 4 criteria: coherence and cohesion, lexical resource, grammatical range, and task achievement.
input:
'Question': 'Some believe that students should begin learning a language very early in school while others think these subjects should be taught later. Discuss both sides and give your own opinion.' 
 'Text': 'Language is a part of individual cognitive development and this should be taught in school. However, there is a debate of what age ought to learn certain language. There are those who think that a language subject should  be taught as early as primary school because children are more receptive and adaptable at this stage compare to  grown up people. But there are  also those who opposed to this belief because the language course should be for adult students suggesting they are more well informed and conscious about what they are getting into.  I am convinced that studying foreign language should initiate at formative years.

 On one hand,  children who are  academically taught of a secondary language as early as gradeschools have more advantages than those who are just learning the foreign language  in later years. The reason for this is children would easily adapt and imitate the words they hear and see in repetition with having better enunciation and retention that is why when another language is introduce to them, there is higher possibility of developing bilingualism. Furthermore, kids are more obedient than adult. They do not have corrupted mind which are good for learning the language despite the existence of others subjects like math and sciences in their schools. So, the early the language is being taught the better the retention and the usage.

On the other hand,  since almost adults are more mature in many ways especially in handling  time and surroundings, the study of the language should be started. There are language courses being offered in some universities that are suited for college students own schedules.  By this routine the students would be able to learn the lesson at their own paces without being bombarded with all other subjects. For example, a postgraduate student wants only to enroll on a Spanish language subject for a whole semester in which this give the student ample time to learn the lesson with concentration. In addition,  older students have way more experienced and interaction with different people thus learning language is much effective.

In summary,  those who are learning the language at formative years have better recollection than those who obtain in later years. In my own opinion, it is really advantage to have acquired foreign language at early age because  this help develop good speaking habit and become more natural native speaker.'

instruction: Grading IELTS Writing Task 2 based on 4 criteria: coherence and cohesion, lexical resource, grammatical range, and task achievement.
input:
'Question': 'These days, people work in more than one job , and often change career several times during their life. What are the advantages and diadvantages of this ?' 
 'Text': 'Nowadays, an increasing number of people can work on multiple jobs and switch careers during their course of life. This work phenomenon has its own advantages and disadvantages, which will be further elaborated in the paragraphs below.

Having more than one job could be an opportunity for people to earn more and do better financially. As these days jobs are becoming more flexible, people can work at the office and do freelance project at the same time, this help people have an additional income and can better provide for their needs. With the flexibility of the jobs that we have right now, people not only can work multiple jobs but also change careers during their life. This could also be beneficial for people, because humans grow from time to time and change their interest. Therefore, changing careers could be a great opportunity for individuals to hone on their new interest and skills.

However, this phenomenon can also have its own disadvantages. Since people now work multiple jobs, this could risk people to overextend themselves and fall into a cycle of burnout. For example, working on a corporate job itself already took physical and mental commitment, adding another work such as freelance projects means taking another commitment which can put a toll on the individual's physical and mental health. Another downside of this is, while people can switch careers several times during their life, this could hinder someone from being a specialist of something and make people more of generalist. While it's not necessarily a bad thing, the world needs specialists to solve many important problems and to be a specialist, one must commit to a certain career path for a long period of time.

In conclusion, working on more than one job and switching careers multiple times in life has its own benefits and drawbacks. By doing these, people can have more income and realise their interest. However on the other side, if not being careful enough, people can fall into a cycle of burnout and lack expertise in their work.'

instruction: Grading IELTS Writing Task 2 based on 4 criteria: coherence and cohesion, lexical resource, grammatical range, and task achievement.

For example, over the last few years, in Africa such exposure causes various skin diseases. Certainly as a result of global climate change. Another important reason for this issues can be climate change. This is because direct sunlight. It is bad condition for ecology.

On the other hand, despite the fact that global warming is a serious problem. There are some reliable solutions to it. The first viable solution to this problem is new breakthrough of scientests and the development of the satellite. For instance, to create a new artificial intelligence to sun. The main thing is to patch the azone layer. Another significant way by which this problem can be tackled is that a robot protecting the azone layer. As a result, layer thickness is estimated.

To conclude, although global warming is a serious problem that is creating many negative effects it can be addressed with the solutions that have been mentioned above. From my personal point of view both governments and individuals should work in collaboration in order to address this issue.'

instruction: Grading IELTS Writing Task 2 based on 4 criteria: coherence and cohesion, lexical resource, grammatical range, and task achievement.
input:
'Question': 'Some people think that success in life comes from hard work and determination, while others think that there are more important factors such as money and appearance. Discuss both views and give your opinion.' 
 'Text': 'It is thought that hard work and determination brings success to life, whereas others believe that outlook and income are some of the more crucial factors. Personally, this writer thinks that hard-working and determined people become successful due to their effort of learning new things, meanwhile, money and appearance only people dependent on the others. Hence, determination is better.

To begin, effortive and hard-working people become successful because they succeed in acknowledge things. To explain, those people with good personality never give up learning new things and also learn from their mistakes everyday. Take Steven Jobs as an example, he was determined to try, fail and try again although he rejected applying to Harvard University and started his own business in a hard-working way.

To continue, appearance and money only makes people dependent on the others. In explanation, individuals who succeed in life by beauty and finance without any academic knowledge or ability to earn money, they just depend on the other people and cannot be independent. Consequently, because of being independent and having no knowledge, people will not be brought up or protected by other people when their appearance and money is gone.

In conclusion, people succeed in life by their own determination is better than those people who use beauty and money as a tool to succeed. The reason is they have their own knowledge and they are not dependent on anybody.'

instruction: Grading IELTS Writing Task 2 based on 4 criteria: coherence and cohesion, lexical resource, grammatical range, and task achievement.
input:
'Question': 'Some people believe that professionals, such as doctors and engineers, should be required to work in the country where they did their training. Others believe they should be free to work in another country if they wish. Discuss both these views and give your own opinion. Give reasons for your answer and include any relevant

examples from your own knowledge or experience.' 
 'Text': 'There are two types of professionals based on how they choose places where they are going to work after graduated from their trainings. It is debatable whether they choose to work in the same country where they got their degree or not. People are divided into two different sides of this issue, the one who think it is a must to work in the same country and the one who think it is their freedom to choose which country they want to work in. This essay will discuss both sides of the arguments and provide clear explanations why it is required for them to work in the same country. 

Firstly, they owe to the country where they pursue their degree, especially if they get a scholarship for that. For instance, governments who provide scholarships for medicine schools clearly want to escalate local health services quality by helping the potential doctor candidates in studying medicine. They have spend a lot of money in order to establish great doctors who will be expected to cure the other citizens who got sick. Therefore, it is a common sense that these doctors or professionals need to contribute back by working in that country. 

Secondly, they tend to learn knowledge that suit with that country characteristics. For example, engineers who learn civil engineering in a country who prone to earthquakes will tend to learn how to build strong buildings that safe from earthquakes. While engineers who study in a cold territory will be capable to build buildings that safe from winter storms. Consequently, the more suitable their knowledge with the country needs, the better and the more maximum they can utilize their skills. 

In conclusion, I believe that requiring professionals to stay and make use their understandings in the same place where they pursued them is a great policy. Furthermore, the benefits and positive effects both the country and the individuals will gain are much more. Because if they did not contribute back to their surroundings, then their surroundings can not receive good impacts from them.'

instruction: Grading IELTS Writing Task 2 based on 4 criteria: coherence and cohesion, lexical resource, grammatical range, and task achievement.
input:
'Question': 'One of the consequence of improved medical care is that people are living longer and life expectancy is increasing

Do you think the advantages of this development outweigh the disadvantages?' 
 'Text': 'In the present times, the upgraded medical care system can have both positive and negative outcomes in society. Despite that condition; however, I agree that the advantages far outweigh the disadvantages, which will be discussed in this essay. 

To begin with, medical care improvements can result in the soaring price of bills. Since a remarkable amount of money have been invested to upgrade the quality of health care deliveries, it is acceptable if people are compelled to pay back in a higher amount. Take, for example, the increasing birth surgery bills that occur at Pondok Indah Hospital in the past few years is due to the decision to upgrade their operation tools as well as the facilities in patient's room for post-operation. Even though that phenomenon is inevitable, I still believe it is no longer important since the government already established health insurance to compensate those who cannot afford to pay for their hospital bills. 

On the other hand, it causes people to have a higher life expectancy. Generally, the improvements that have been made can be utilised to take preventive actions to alleviate the risks from particular disease, which can make people receive advanced treatment before they are getting worse. For example, the novel cancer-detector equipment that is used by one of eminent hospital in America successfully make one of their citizens, Teressa, to quickly receive an early treatment for her conditions. As a result, the doctor stated that her chance to live has risen to 48%, since the cancer is detected earlier than it should, Therefore, I think the improvements in medical care will have significant impact on society because it heightens the likelihood to suffer from diseases that can be prevented earlier. 

To conclude, although the improvements in the clinical care resulting in the higher amount of bill that should be paid, I still think the benefits outweigh the earlier drawbacks since it can make people have live longevity by preventing the given symptoms of diseases earlier.'

instruction: Grading IELTS Writing Task 2 based on 4 criteria: coherence and cohesion, lexical resource, grammatical range, and task achievement.
input:
'Question': 'Detailed reporting of crime has bad effects. Consequently, such details should not be reported in the media. To what extent do you agree or disagree?' 
 'Text': 'Nowadays more and more people have had crime and bad effects. It is reporting details journalism and TV news. Therefore, it is the outcome of bad effects such as should not be reported in the media. It is I totally disagree with and in this essay, I will discuss it.

first of all, nowadays people are more crime in the society. but sometimes society does not understand it. Because some of the crimes the government or police they want to close it and they do not give it to anyone.For instance, someone who catches the police they given to more furnished them in prison without any reason. As a result, someone becomes injured or dies. At this time they want to close it and they do not give it to society. For the more, if some crime journalism is given to newspapers or given to TV News people who understand it and they can control and care for themselves. I think detail reporting is convenient for society how can it be managed.

On the other hand, they do ont reporting or not given any crime details to society people do not understand what happened in out and they do not understand how to control it. For example, someone who come to home in steal they do not know about it and sometimes people they killed and they fulfill their needs. As a result, more and more crimes happening because they are not given reporting.

In conclusion, these days more crime becomes about not being given details or news. If the government always gives details can control it. Details reporting can be a crime reduced.'

instruction: Grading IELTS Writing Task 2 based on 4 criteria: coherence and cohesion, lexical resource, grammatical range, and task achievement.
input:
'Question': 'Some people prefer to carefully plan activities in their free time others think it’s a waste of time. Discuss both views and give your answer?' 
 'Text': 'A number of individuals tend to manage plan undertakings in their leisure time. Meanwhile, others assumed that it is kind of way to proscratinating. I will discuss both of these opinions and providing my own views. 

On the one hand, some communities spend their activities in leissure time efficiently by planning. In some cases, planning allows people to maximise enjoyment because they ensure people to spend their time in comfortable condition. In addition, people come with schedulling scheme in their free time also are likely to utilize time effectively. This also provide us to pursuing our main target and priorities. For example, in the last school period holiday, students prefer to seriously manage a plan in order to be suitable with their school schedule and available budget.

On the another hand, some individuals think that planning is kind of proscratinating. Because eveybody has limited ability to create the time management on their own, thus, they are more comfortable to do everything spontaneously. In addition, this case depends on personal preference, some people differ which activities require serious planning schemes and  which do not. For example, walking around resident's housings and doing hobbies are not essential activities to create its plans. Furthermore, if we are obsessed with many plans, it will enhance our stress level.

Overall, I think that planning in our leissure time is crucial for us, as long as we have a lots of agendas that must be completed quickly'

instruction: Grading IELTS Writing Task 2 based on 4 criteria: coherence and cohesion, lexical resource, grammatical range, and task achievement.
input:
'Question': 'Some people believe hat all children should learn a foreign language from the time

they start school, while others believe it is better to wait until a child is at secondary

school. Discuss both views and give your own opinion.' 
 'Text': 'Some individuals feel that all kids should be learning a second language since early school years, however, others think that it should preferably begin from secondary school. I believe that it is better to start learning a foreign language since the beginning of school years as younger kids are fast learners. This essay will discuss both sides of the argument and a reasonable conclusion will be drawn later.

     Many people believe that teaching any non-native language should not start prior to secondary school. The main reason behind this viewpoint is that they may choose it according to their future needs. For instance, students planning to move to a certain country for higher studies might get benefit from learning that native language in advance. Thus, foreign language studies should start from secondary school only.

     However, others think that children must be learning a foreign language as soon as they start school. A major factor, supporting their belief is that smaller kids are smart learners. For example, pre-school students accompanied by foreign nannies, often learn their second language very easily in comparison with teen-age group having similar company. Therefore, any non-native language could be smoothly learned at an early age.

    Both views put forward valid points, but I strongly believe that children should start learning a foreign language as early as schooling begins. Early learning is faster and improves as the child develops speech milestones. So, children should learn foreign language since early school time.

   To conclude, although some people think that learning a foreign language should be a part of secondary school education to select it as per requirement, I feel that it should start the moment a child gets into a school as younger kids learn new things easily.'

instruction: Grading IELTS Writing Task 2 based on 4 criteria: coherence and cohesion, lexical resource, grammatical range, and task achievement.
input:
'Question': 'Global warming is one of the most serious issues that the world is facing today.

What are the causes of global warming and what measures can governments and individuals take to tackle the issue?' 
 'Text': 'Over the last few years, climate change has become one of the major problems that people should pay attention. While some problems that global warming and many people are claimed to be the main reasons behind this issue, there are some effective solutions that can be applied. In this essay, I will discuss major reasons and effective solutions of this problem.

On the one hand, there are a variety of different factors that have led to climate of pollution . The first problem is very bad for people and our environment. For instance, reducing of exist, developing of death, such as it is appearing various diseases and other reasons. Consequently, many people are going to the hospital. It has become very  bad for humans. Another important reason for this issue can be very bad effecting to our health. The reason for this that many factories are making a harmful gases and harmful pollution.

On the other hand, despite the fact that global warming is a serious problem, there are some reliable solutions to it. Thus, the first viable tackle to this problem is planting different trees. For example, we must keeping mother nature. Another significant way by which is problem can be tackled is that many factories are should losing make a waste material. Likewise, the reason for this is that many people planting beautiful trees and flowers.

To conclude, although climate change is a serious problem that is creating many negative effects, so it can be addressed with the solutions that have been mentioned above. From my personal point of view, both government and individuals should work in collaboration in order to address this issue.'

instruction: Grading IELTS Writing Task 2 based on 4 criteria: coherence and cohesion, lexical resource, grammatical range, and task achievement.
input:
'Question': 'Since most information about culture and history can be found online, museums are no longer needed. To what extent do you agree or disagree?' 
 'Text': 'It is generally accepted that in the modern days internet has become a big important role in people's life. Some might argue that museums are no longer needed anymore because an online platforms are much easier to access through the information. This essay will demonstrates why both sources should still exist for the learners.

The internet platform in the present has become one of the best tools in human's life. The first initial reason is that social websites contain almost all information about things that happened in the world from past to present. Moreover, Ai has been involved as a helping tools in the online world which is very beneficial to the users, such as the users can type the questions to ask them, and they can do a quick research within 2 minutes with an accurate answers, which is very easy for people to get through the informations and knowledges. There are also some drawbacks to it, such as sometimes the users might recieve fake news, because of the unreliable sources from the spammers, which lead people to misunderstand.

Turns to the details of the museum place, the first notable benefit is the kids will not going to get fake information because every story from the books were written by  real resources and popular authors, most of the books have been proven by  UNESCO before being taken in to the galleries. Furthermore, children will have an opportunity to learn be seeing the real objects and pictures, this is the best way to study with experiencing the physical objects. In contrast, the galleries contain a huge number of the information, which might be hard to find some art piece, whereas the internet can be straight through the things that they would like to study.

In conclusion, in both sources can be beneficial in different ways as the reasons mentioned above, but there are also some disadvantages in some points of view too, depending on the situation. As the suggestion, everyone should be careful  the researching information from social platforms, try to explore many different websites. Additionally, they can merge the knowledge from two places, to recheck the true story.'

instruction: Grading IELTS Writing Task 2 based on 4 criteria: coherence and cohesion, lexical resource, grammatical range, and task achievement.
input:
'Question': 'In some countries, a few people earn extremely high salaries. Some people think that this is good for a country, while others believe that the government should control salaries and limit the amount people can learn.' 
 'Text': 'Nowadays, although some people are earning uncountable money from their business, plenty of indviduals criticize the situation due to its harm in countries, others advocate that a few people should remain earning good money in their job. This essay will discuss both these point of views and argue in favour of the letter. 

One the one hand, quite small of employees do compelling works in their job area.  Futhermore, As a result those individuals deserve impressive cash in the job by taking risks and significiant roles. Salary is a fundamental method for workers in order to proceed logically their career. Was the government lessened their salary, they would not be motivated so as to work in the office. For instance, in 2018 Spain government amended their rules about salaries in jobs. it was observed that a myriad of people dismissed their work. Moreover, does earning huge money contributes people's focus on their work, and it also promotes human's life quality. In this way criminal issues would have an downward trend around the country.

On the other hand, finance system of the country might be exposed by some individuals earning a lot of money. Besides, Governments could reduce their other contribution for the environment in order to provide a fund for employees deserving to earn good salary. For example, republic of Turkey was able to present their financial circumstance by benefitting from the method. Thus, countries tend to reduce significiant people's salary so as to provide locals beneficial opportunities.

In my opinion, economy ministry in countries should lessen amount of salaries for spesific persons in order to navigate economic source of country to other part of things.

In conclusion, developing salaries has an extremely disadvantages for citizens becouse of its burden on economy. However, this essay advocate that countries should amend their precedures on salaries to provide locals good opportunities.'

instruction: Grading IELTS Writing Task 2 based on 4 criteria: coherence and cohesion, lexical resource, grammatical range, and task achievement.
input:
'Question': 'The plans below show the ground floor of a library in 2001 and how it was redeveloped in 2009.

Summarise the information by selecting and reporting the main features, and make comparisons where relevant.' 
 'Text': 'The given schemes compare the ground floor of a library in 2001 and 8 years later, in 2009.

Overall, the library underwent several developments by 2009. Although there were just a few genres of books at first, a wide range of categories was provided later. Children’s area and computers were also installed to meet the need of people.

In 2001, the bookshelves containing self-help and history books were located on the left of the floor, while fiction ones were placed at the top. The newspaper and periodicals section was allocated to the right, which was no longer in use 8 years later. The center of the library was utilized for seating with several small tables. The librarian’s desk was right at the entrance, occupied with the stairs leading to the second floor.

Even though the bookshelves’ positions remained unchanged, the contents were separated into more fields, namely kitchen, economics, law books, films and DVDs. However, the previous fiction bookshelf  was substituted by an additional seating area. The old tables were also transformed into larger ones. Remarkably, whereas the librarian’s desk and stairs stayed the same, children’s area and computers were added.'

instruction: Grading IELTS Writing Task 2 based on 4 criteria: coherence and cohesion, lexical resource, grammatical range, and task achievement.
input:
'Question': '12.The range and quality of foods have been improved with the development of technology and scientific advance. Some people think it is a good development while others consider it harmful. Discuss both views and give your own opinion.' 
 'Text': 'Food processing technology has improved the variety of foods available and their quality. A portion of society argues that it is a beneficial advancement while others contend that it has negative effects. Both of the viewpoints have their own rationale but I reckon that overall it has improved the eatables.

To begin with, there are many improvements caused by the scientific advances in the edible items. At first, it has decreased the overall perishability of the eatable items. Many methods have been introduced to increase the shelf-life of the products. For instance, pasteurization has improved the dairy products. Nowadays, dairy can be stored for a longer period of time than the past. Consequently, it resulted in the sustainability of the agriculture. The overload of produce waste and production demands had caused numerous environmental damages in the past. Hence, the produce storage techniques and advancements in the food storage has lowered the burden on the fields. Now, the ecosystem is more sustainable than the bygone era.

On the contrary, the contenders think that the technology has adverse effects on the human well-being. One argument provided by such people is that a plethora of the food additives added to the perishable items to preserve them are dangerous to the human health. For instance, many studies suggest that preservatives have carcinogenic effects on the genetic material of the organisms.

Hence, they do not favour such kind of advances in the biochemical science and believe that it have damaged the well-being.

To conclude, it is crucial that the production and the storage of the agricultural produce becomes sustainable and reduce any environmental pressure. However, the worries of arguers about the harmful effects of the chemicals on the living organisms are concerning. In a nutshell, people have benefited from the advances in the science.'

instruction: Grading IELTS Writing Task 2 based on 4 criteria: coherence and cohesion, lexical resource, grammatical range, and task achievement.
input:
'Question': 'Bạn đã gửisome people say the main way to be happy in life is to have a lot of money.How might having a lot of money make people happy?What other things in life can make people happy?' 
 'Text': 'It has been frequently argued that in the current period, few people protest that when mental happy, people will happy. However, many individuals argue that, money can make human cheerful. I will shed light on my stance in the following essay. 

To begin with, I wouldn't say money brings gladness and I would say it can dramatically increase the opportunity for citizens to be satisfied. For example, money allows nation stop worrying enough to enjoy life. I mean it lets others get more life experiences such as learning to ride a horse or diving in some Medxican caves. It also lets people take care of their health. For instance, go to the gym or swimming pool. 

On the others hand, it is common belief that, residents labor long hours, day and night, and even when they are unwell. However, with great human ambition, money is never enough. Even if we work for decades and work hard, we still do not feel complete. To be honest, it is determined by individuals their needs and desires, their preception of the world in general and happiness in particular. Some citizens in my country feel cheerful with pets or spending time with family and friends. Moreover, these people are grateful for minor mercies and appreciate every moment of their lives. Others take pleasure in dancing, singing, getting new experiences, doing things they love to do and helping other people. For instance, nation feels joyful only after purchasing something. They dream or dreamt about or just window shopping as well as those who take pleasure in pampering themselves and meditating. 

In short, having determination about money will help individuals advance, but that doesn't mean our life only revolves around it. Enjoy the best things the world has to offer human, calm down and feel it'

instruction: Grading IELTS Writing Task 2 based on 4 criteria: coherence and cohesion, lexical resource, grammatical range, and task achievement.
input:
'Question': 'The increase in the production of consumer goods results in damage to the natural environment.' 
 'Text': 'In recent times, the production of consumer goods has been rapidly increasing, leading to the harmful effects on the environment.This essay agrees that art and culture is a unique identity of the nation and government must allocate some funds to preserve them.

To commence with, art and culture represent the country in the whole world, and the global reputation of any nation is determined by its rich culture. For example, India is well known for its culture of unity in diversity, hence, most countries believe that India is open in terms of accepting new ideas. Furthermore, global image of any country is very significant factor in terms of maintaining relations with other countries. For instance, it is very easy for middle eastern countries to establish good relation with each other as they have similar cultures.

On the other hand, some individuals opine that spending people’s money on organizing art and cultural event has no direct benefits, and government should spend more on the development of education, health sector and other pressing problems. Although investing government funds on education and health sector is necessary, spending to preserve the rich culture of the nation should not be avoided because spending on them not only unites the citizens, but it also affects the global reputation of the country.

To sum up, arts and culture are one of the significant factors in terms of maintaining geopolitical image and relations with other countries, and they should be given importance when deciding where government should allocate its resources.'

instruction: Grading IELTS Writing Task 2 based on 4 criteria: coherence and cohesion, lexical resource, grammatical range, and task achievement.
input:
'Question': 'As the internet becomes more popular, newspapers are becoming a thing of the past.

To what extent do you agree or disagree with this statement?

Give reasons for your answer and include any relevant examples from your own knowledge and experience.

Write at least 250 words.' 
 'Text': 'It cannot be denied that in this modern age of internet, newspapers are considered as outdated trend by the majority of population. I am partially agree with this phenomenon because old people are still prefer to read newspapers instead of reading the news on the screen.

To begin with, In this cut-throat competition individuals do not have enough time to sit and read the newspapers because everything is available on internet easily. For Instance, now a days social media spread the any type of news all over the world within a few seconds therefore people did not get the chance to read newspaper. Secondly, sometimes newspapers print irrelevant news rather than providing necessary information of the surrounding therefore it becomes bore for the readers, and they prefer internet to get the updates. Moreover, some people think that it is the extra expense for them to purchase newspapers as they are already paying for their mobile data therefore it can be the reason of declining the usage of newspapers.

on the other hand, older people believe that newspapers are best source to connect with the things that happened around the world. However, whenever they felt isolated they prefer to read the newspaper to spend their quality of time. Although, old aged people are not  that much efficient to use the modern technical gadgets as the young generation. They find it a herculean task to operate the smart phones as well as internet therefore they prefer paper reading therefore, It can be reason that newspaper are not entirely disappear. Moreover, some parents thought that newspapers are the best source of learning vocabulary and build the reading habits in their children as well as they are some interesting things are published for the students . For instance, there are lots of puzzles, painting and mathematics tricks posted in the newspapers so it is beneficial for learning process.

In Conclusion, It can be analyzed that despite the influence of internet decreases the importance of newspapers but it cannot be completely diminished as some percentage of people still prefer to read paper based news because of their less expertise of digital gadgets as well as for the learning purpose.'

instruction: Grading IELTS Writing Task 2 based on 4 criteria: coherence and cohesion, lexical resource, grammatical range, and task achievement.
input:
'Question': 'The position of women in society has changed markedly in the last twenty years. many of the problems young people now experience such as juvenile deliquency, arise from the fact that many married women now work and are not at home to care for their children. to what extent do you agree or disagree with this opioion?' 
 'Text': 'Human being had been evolution a milion of years. At stone age, men with more strength than women have responrity to do hunting a dangerous duty to find a food for their family. Therefor, women  were left at a cave to take care their children. To survive this behavior continious foward to new generation. However, the intellectual process of human being and the deveolpment of technology, a duty or carrier not depend on gender anymore. In fact, the problems of young people such as juvenile deliquency not only cause by their mother not care of them, but it can cause by many factors.

In my point of view, a teenature who live with their full time mom in bad enviroment. A violence in family by father, mother, silbing or relatives resulting in mental disorder to their childen by anxiety and depresssion. When younger have a weak mental health, they will be seduce by bad people to do something bad more easily than usual. 

In some case, parents with a well prepare money, education and mental health to have a child expecting their child to be a perfect person such as an asian parenting. The asian parents want their children to be a number one in every thing, a lot of pressure puting on their child makes them a phycosis. The mental disorder give a people to be unconcious, they did not know that they do a bad thing with others. 

Moreover, nowadays a social media and internet have more impact to teenature's life. Social media such as intragram, facebook and X enhance the change to talking to a stranger. These strangers can meet a young-age and manipulate them to misconception.

In summary, I disagree that the role of take care a children was only for woman. Now, we have a childcare and education systems, in supporting working parents.
