 'Text': 'Every school subject brings different knowledge, experience and skills to pupils. Some people argue that learning History should be the first and foremost fields at school. Others believe that in nowadays, on this quickly changed modern world there is another subjects, like Science and Technology which pupils should pay attention more than History.

I am agree with the statement that students should be engaged much more with Science and Technology for better future, but I think than there is a several benefits to know about the History as well.

In this essay I will support this view with arguments in the following paragraphs.

There are several reasons why History is one of the most important subject at school.

However when it comes to History everyone should know about his ancestors and what they did to develop a particular country. Many authors pose that people can't build a future and can't live in the present without having a basic knowledge about their pasts. Studying History can provide valuable insights into the development of society and cultures. For instance it is useful to know about what previous people did and how they did, this can lead to a good oportunity for people who live in present to compare and don't make the same mistakes as their predecessor did in the past.

Furthermore we live in an era of technology and everything is changing very fast.

Encourage pupils to pay more attention to Science and Technology fields will be a benefitial for the society as a population we need more and more scientists to work out to find a new technology in case of to improve people's quality of life. 

Moreover schools should engaged students deeply with this important subject and not at least by developing new technology which will be useful for the humanity. 

In conclusion, both fields History and Science/Technology should be provided to pupils with balance between them, because without knowing their past young people cannot build a good future.'

instruction: Grading IELTS Writing Task 2 based on 4 criteria: coherence and cohesion, lexical resource, grammatical range, and task achievement.
input:
'Question': 'Many people believe that using a bicycle as your main form of transport has a lot of advantages whereas others think that it has many disadvantages. Discuss both views and give your opinion.' 
 'Text': 'Recently, there have been some debates about whether bicycles should be used as the main vehicle for everyone as a large amount of benefits from that form of transport, but some think it still has a lot of drawbacks. From my perspective, I think bicycles can not replace others . In this essay, I will discuss both views and explain my own opinion. 

To begin with, there is one primary reason why people think bicycles should be regarded as the main transport. That is the avoidance of becoming a pollutant, which as we all know  protecting the environment by reducing a large amount of emissions from vehicles is always a topic that people are concerned about. By riding bicycles as the main transportation, people believe that the earth will be decreased a significant fuel fume each year that burning fuel vehicles are running which actually help our society we are living. In addition to being friendly to the environment, those bikers think that using a bike will not cost too much money, and the insurance for cars, bills for oil or taxes for roads will be saved for other purposes.

 

In spite of enormous advantages, using bicycles as the main vehicle also creates other problems such as taking too much time to move around, which others will be better especially to reach to far destinations. Besides, cycles will not cover entirely the environmental matters as well due to emissions only contributing a small proportion to the whole picture. With  modern technology, there are many new electric cars that are not only able to deal with environmental problems, but also faster and more effective than cycles. 

In conclusion, using bicycles as the main can help people save a large of money for running it and reduce emissions from vehicles, but it takes users too much time to go far points, and also can not tackle completely the environmental issues, which make using electric vehicles wiser.'

instruction: Grading IELTS Writing Task 2 based on 4 criteria: coherence and cohesion, lexical resource, grammatical range, and task achievement.
input:
'Question': 'Robots and artifical intelligence are being developed to replace humans in the workplace. Why is this happening? Do you think this will have a positive or negative impact on society?' 
 'Text': 'In today digital ear, the development of AI (artificial intelligent) and automatic machine are increasing the replacement in workplace of humankind. The writer believes that this is a positive change due to the public’s requirement about life standard and also the development of human legacy.

It must be understood that the advancement of AI beginning at social enhancement of better living standard. Following the advanced industrialization in many fields of life, the automatic organization of AI supports many procedure process with a sustainable quality. Moreover, the application of robots to daily life supports many works become automated that many tasks are automatically completed quickly like a vending machine. Take Samsung as an exam that this corporation utilizes robots and AI in the industrial process and also in their products that are widely consumed all around the world make it becomes one of the biggest company in the world.

Another argument worth considering is that the advancement of worldwide innovation. In other words, Industrial revolution of human legacy are now developed with the extremely supports of AI due to the rapidly solve many matters in many fields include science. As a result, a number of missions that difficult to handle manually now can be easier finish with the help of AI and robots. Thus, it leads to forward-looking changes in progress of exploring knowledge of people.

In conclusion, the author believes that the evolution of robots and artificial intelligent to replace human jobs occurs by the need of people in enhance living standard. Moreover, this in a positive adjustment due to it supports humankind in many fields of science in global modernization.'

instruction: Grading IELTS Writing Task 2 based on 4 criteria: coherence and cohesion, lexical resource, grammatical range, and task achievement.
input:
'Question': 'Some people believe that mobile phone conversations should be banned in crowded and social places, while others argue it is okay to be allowed. Discuss both views and give your own opinion.' 
 'Text': 'Today, there is an argument between people who have a faith in not using cellphones in public areas and people who think that this case is not a serious problem and it should be permitted. This essay agrees that having probation for conversation via digital gadgets in public places should be taking into account.

On the one hand, the vast majority of people in a society are agree that speaking with the phone in crowded places should be banned. These days most of people have a cellphone which has an undeniable role in our daily life, while human is a sociable and needs to have in person conversation rather than virtual one. So, when a lot of people in a small place are starting to talk on mobile phones, not only noise pollution will be raised but also the distance between two companies will be raised too. For instance, because of improvement in new technologies and new smartphones, the rate of divorces between 2018 and 2019 is 60% higher in comparison to 2001 and 2002.

On the other hand, having a public discussion with someone by smart gadgets is preferable by some people. There is a concept that is believed, a lot of our daily tasks, including minor things, are depended to new technologies. So, people should be allowed to use their smartphones wherever they want. However, by rising a noise pollution in public areas, some person can have physical or mental problems. As a consequence, facing these circumstances could be dangerous mentally and physically for them. For example, when a person is suffering from anxiety, it is not preferable for him to be a crowded place where everyone speak in high pitch.

In conclusion, these day by emerging the cutting-edge technologies, people have an argument about using telephone in public place or it should be stopped. Since, having conversation in public places can bring noise, it is vital to not having conversation with phones in public places.'

instruction: Grading IELTS Writing Task 2 based on 4 criteria: coherence and cohesion, lexical resource, grammatical range, and task achievement.
input:
'Question': 'In many countries, children are becoming overweight and unhealthy. Some people think that the government has the responsibility to solve this problem.

To what extent do you agree or disagree?' 
 'Text': 'In several countries, teenagers are now gaining more weight, which has a negative impact on their health. A group of individuals say that the government needs to  address this issue for some reasons. Although some individuals agree with this matter due to several reasons, I strongly disagree with this statement.

Firstly, parents should be in charge of their children's obesity and their unhealthy. This is because mothers always prepare daily meals for kids or buy materials for families’ meals. For instance, Vietnamese women like cooking with oil and butter, so children’s obesity increased rapidly. Moreover, their fathers buy snacks for them after they go home.                                                                                                                     

Secondly, teenagers must be aware of their obese states. In other words, they lack control of what they eat. For example, American and Vietnamese children love eating fast food and consume too much milk tea after lots of times they need to study at school. Therefore, they have a disease and obesity.

In conclusion, the government does not have a response for these reasons. Therefore, parents need to be careful with this activity and say that their children should eat more clearly. Teenagers just need to eat healthy food because it’s good for their improvement.'

instruction: Grading IELTS Writing Task 2 based on 4 criteria: coherence and cohesion, lexical resource, grammatical range, and task achievement.
input:
'Question': 'Cities are becoming overcrowded.

What are the causes of this situation, and what can be done to improve this situation?' 
 'Text': 'Overpopulation in some cities is the major cause of many problems. This essay will examine the main causes of overcrowded in cities and solutions to this problem. 

The two main reasons for cities being overpopulated are mass migrations, from urban to city, of mankind and continued development of buildings in some cities. When humans, massively, move to a big city, they will contribute to the rising number of people working, learning, and living in the city. It will have a huge impact on cities population growth and result in a great amount of people in the city. On the other hand, as a result of the rising number of people, the development of social infratructure will escalate to accommodate the society's lifestyle, workplace, and entertainment. Thus, big town will be overly crowded and hard to handle. 

The solutions referring to this problem are increasing job expectancies in the rural area and pursuing accommodations accessibility for everyone in the urban areas. Generally, when job opportunities are rising outside of big cities, the intentions will switch, for some people, to get a career in that area. So that, decreasing migration to the city and increasing movement to the rural area. Developing even  better  rural areas is also important to promote a better living environment and lifestyle. 

In conclusion, a significant number of people migrating to the city will result in overpopulation in the area and project a bad life expectancy.'

instruction: Grading IELTS Writing Task 2 based on 4 criteria: coherence and cohesion, lexical resource, grammatical range, and task achievement.
input:
'Question': 'in some cultures, children are often told that they can achieve anything if they try hard enough. what are the advantages and disadvanteges of giving children this massege?' 
 'Text': 'In some nations, it is a common belief that children can accomplish anything if they endeavor on it.

However, I disagree with it wholeheartedly, and  I will explain why in the following paragraphs.

On the one hand, hard working is super important, if you want to do something quickly. It can accelerate it. By doing that, people may succeed in their fields, and fulfill their dreams. Without working hard, they are ordinary. Almost all the famous scientists, academics, scholars, and so on contributed their achievements to their efforts especially, Thomas Edison. 

On the other hand, trying hard is not always work, though. If you want to do something fantastic, that will not work smoothly. For example, if you want to be a wizard like Harry Potter, and you try your best to find magic spells in the world, it will end with nothing. Besides, completing a goal requires not only the time you put in but also needs luck, talent, wisdom, and the like. Working time is one of vital factors that affecting things can be happened or not, but this is not the only element. You have to evaluate the situation you have right now.  The law of attraction is the well-known theory about working hard, but it is fake. I did it many times, but I got nothing. 

In a nutshell, you have to do something hard in order to finish it fast. However, the time you use in it is not the only thing that decides whether you make it or not. It depends on so many things. You must consider all of them if you want to achieve.'

instruction: Grading IELTS Writing Task 2 based on 4 criteria: coherence and cohesion, lexical resource, grammatical range, and task achievement.
input:
'Question': 'If you have ever tried to log into your Netflix account to watch shows or movies while travelling overseas, you may have encountered that the available content is different from home. Should some movies on streaming like Netflix be banned in some certain country?' 
 'Text': 'Netflix, the biggest worldwide streaming platforms, provide various of content, including korean drama, crash landing on you; documentary, the tinder swindler; and cartoon, my little pony. Netflix platforms design to access everywhere all around the world. However, a content in each country is different. This article will explore why few televisions program should banned in some territory.

Nowadays, our world has diversity point of view, freedom of speech and everyone has freedom of speech through various internet networking, so some television program is inappropriate in some continental. For example, American drama Anna and the king of siam, the story portray professor who taught English for Thailand's royalty, is banned in Thailand even though this movie hold 5 oscars trophy. This is because the movie was distroted Thai history and sarcastic Thai culture by convey with hilarious way. As a result, displaying royal institution in negative aspects. If Thai people watch this movie, they might change attitude to unfavorable monarchy which can lead to detrimental effect such as diminish commitment in institute, culturally offensive, and national security concerns. Netflix take right action because it is the way to preserve cultural norms and moral fabric.  

In conclusion, some entertainment media should be prohibit due to the fact that cinematic productions conveyed into conflict by distinctive attitude or alter historic. As society grapple with the challenges posed by globalization and technological advancements, it is crucial to foster mutual understanding and critically that uphold the values of inclusivity respect in a media landscape to prevent nationality disagreement.'

instruction: Grading IELTS Writing Task 2 based on 4 criteria: coherence and cohesion, lexical resource, grammatical range, and task achievement.
input:
'Question': 'Some people think that the best way to reduce the time spent in traveling to work is to replace parks and gardens close to the city center with apartment buildings for commuters, but others disagree. Discuss both views and give your own opinion.' 
 'Text': 'There is a school of thought that the perfect route to minimize the time spent in traveling to work is to replace the parks and gradens close to the city center with apartment buildings for commuters whereas others do not advocate for this idea. From my perspective, I prefer to keep the existence of the parks and garderns in the heart of city. Also, this essay will shed light on both views and provide my viewpoint.

On the one hand, some people argue that replacing the parks and gardern close to the city center by apartment buildings to get more waste spaces. If the park and garden spaces covert in to apartment buildings that will emerge a variety benefits for people working in the center of city. Firtstly, the number of housing will increase as additional spaces so employees or official workers have more optins to live near the company. Following that, because the short distance between house and company, the transport time will be shorter than the present.

On the other hand, others have a converse opinion that green spaces must be kept in the heart of city. Fisrtly, originally the rate of pollution in the city is usually at the alarm level that is the reason why the parks and gardens exist in the center of city. They play a vital role as a lung of city to provide more oxygen and mitigate the polluted issues. Moreover, the parks and gardens in the city become paramount to provide a entertainment area to avoid technological devices or educate children about plants and creatures. In addition, they are also a healing place for people under pressure from work, which help people are refresh and energized. 

With all of the aforemention theses and explanations, the conclusion is self-evident. From my standpoint, I belive that replacing the parks and gardens by housing and building can emerge several advantages for commuters; however, the green spaces in the heart of city are far more imperative for environment and human's health.'

instruction: Grading IELTS Writing Task 2 based on 4 criteria: coherence and cohesion, lexical resource, grammatical range, and task achievement.
input:
'Question': 'In some countries children have very strict rules of behaviour, while in other countries they are allowed to do almost anything they want.

To what extent should children have to follow rules?' 
 'Text': 'Different countries have different approaches to bringing up children. Some of them allow children to do anything thay want, and others have strict rules.

The modern world has plenty variants of behaviour rules some countries and cultures are closer to strict rules and some prefer to avoid them.  Strict rules of behaviour will help to educate children in proper way, but who decides that this way is really better then another? Children in China are very disciplined and lern natural sciences better then others and it helps them to be successful in future. Also  those rules can teach children to respect other people and how to play impontant role in society.

However, flexible rules or absense of them often persuade children to explore world by themselves and it helps them to learn a lot of different things. People, who grow in this setting can develop their talants freely, without any restrictions. Moreover, this approach helps creative people to find themselves. But sometimes, childrens, who don't have any boundaries can be very annoying, or than can face problems, which thay can't solve without their parents.

In my opinion, parents have to find something in the middle between of both approaches. Some rules can be userful and life-saving, but other can supress imagination, dreams and talants of their child. Moreover, as I reckon parents should understand their children and adjust rules to character, because every person is different. Only personal approach will bring new healthy, creative and kind people to our society.'

instruction: Grading IELTS Writing Task 2 based on 4 criteria: coherence and cohesion, lexical resource, grammatical range, and task achievement.
input:
'Question': '\' 
 'Text': 'Nowadays an increasing number of people opt to obtain a university degree in a different region instead of staying in their hometowns and living with parents during studies. This choice has a number of benefits and drawbacks, which will be discussed in this essay.

An opportunity to study in a different city or even a country offers various advantages. First of all, moving out for studies is considered as a perfect way of separation from parents.  For instance, United States National Institute of Health stipulates that in spite of painful feeling a child might have, it is better to smoothly proceed to separate from caretakers at a young age starting from 18 years old. Moreover, it is the age of graduation from school in a number of countries, which is why it is a high time to decide whether to apply for a local higher education facility or try more challenging options. I believe that there are plenty of positive reasons. If a person travels for learning, they experience living in a new country, culture, make international friends and see popular sightseeings. In addition, another pros is receiving a proper degree from top-ranked foreign high school and meet notorious professors all over the world.

On the contrary, some obstacles could be experienced. Despite the appealing features, young people who have never been far away from the hometowns face severe difficulties such as governmental bureaucracy, higher expenses for accommodation, food and travelling there. They might feel lonely and miss their close relatives and friends as well. 

To sum up, more and more apprentices strive to receive a higher degree at a foreign university. Personally, I think that benefits of studying abroad outweigh the disadvantages due to following reasons: become truly independent, new culture, language and place of living and make friends from around the world.'

instruction: Grading IELTS Writing Task 2 based on 4 criteria: coherence and cohesion, lexical resource, grammatical range, and task achievement.
input:
'Question': 'As countries develop, their populations tend to live individually or in small family units. What are the causes of this trend and what are the effects on society?' 
 'Text': 'Along with the development of a country, people tend to choose small unit of a family in terms of staying in single or unclear family. I believe that the limited living space and the living cost are the major reasons, and it also brings benefits and drawbacks.

Regarding the trend of staying single or unclear family, I believe the limited living space has a straightforward impact. Due to the development of a country, the population will increase relatively. However, to raising the level of life comfort under the condition of limited living space in particular, people will tend to choose staying in single or nuclear family. Moreover, living costs raising is a undeniable trend as a country develop. Once the living cost is raised, the economy will become the primary issue for a person because extend family has much higher cost. As a result, people will choose living individual or nuclear family in order to afford the life living.

The trend of small family unit also leads to some drawbacks. first of all, the family relationships can grow apart. As the family member are living relatively, they will not able to remain the relationships. As time goes by, the relationship will grow apart. Furthermore, people can easily suffer from the social anxiety. people growing up without brothers and sisters, they usually lack social experience because family cannot provide the function of interaction. Therefore, people can easily have problem on social interactions and lead to the anxiety.

In conclusion, the trend of living individual and nuclear family is due to the reason of limited living space and the raising of cost living, and it can lead to the drawbacks: the family relationships grow apart and social anxiety.'

instruction: Grading IELTS Writing Task 2 based on 4 criteria: coherence and cohesion, lexical resource, grammatical range, and task achievement.
input:
'Question': 'There are more new towns nowadays, it is more important to include public parks and sports for individuals to spend their free time. To what extent do you agree or disagree?' 
 'Text': 'Nowadays many new city established in many country. It is necessary to make parks and sports for people's leisure time.  I agree with this statements because public parks get opportunity to walk, childreen play and enjoy leisure times. Besides,  individual sports give the chances to feet our-self, know various sports.  

Firstly, public parks give us opportunity to walk,  children play and enjoy leisure times. Public parks give us a wide area to walk in our free time which is a great scope to keep peace our mind. Besides, it is a common place where every ages children come for playing with their friends.  As well as no other chance is as good as like park to emphasize the beauty of nature,  which peolpe enjoy their leisure time. A survey conducted with the 'Children Growth  Foundation' in lasr year and they found that almost 45% children came to their nearest park with their parents during leisure time.

Moreover,  individual sports give the chances to keep feet and know to other sports. It is the great opportunity to enjoy and keep fitness both during free time. Furthermore, Children and young boys introduced themself with various sports and also passing some time with that games which they like most. By individual games people get the chance to  increased their creativity in their free time. 

In conclusion,  public park gets the scope to enjoy people's leisure time with play,walk and gaining the natural beauty. Besides individual sports keep peoples fitness by play with various types of games which they liked most.'

instruction: Grading IELTS Writing Task 2 based on 4 criteria: coherence and cohesion, lexical resource, grammatical range, and task achievement.
input:
'Question': 'some people think that manufactures and shopping malls should sell fewer packagaed products while others argue that people have the responsibility to buy products with less packaging. Discuss both views and give your opinion.' 
 'Text': 'A thouhght of having less packaged products has become increasingly common. Certain individuals believe that sellers of such items are responsible whereas others opine that consumers should be considerate of using less packaged goods. This essay intends to shed light on both views and I have a divided opinion. 

To Begin with, many wonderful facets are associated with the fact that selling lees packaged items is duty of merchant. The dominant is, brand image and getting repetative custumers. To be more specific, buyers who are concered about the impacts of excessive packing on the health and environment will incline towards the brands promoting the same. Therefore, clients will stick to the company for long-term and also will promote the brand by word of mouth.For an instanace, skin care manufacturers like Mama Earth and Derma co. encourage the concept of less packaging as a result these companies have highest number of repurchasing in the country. Futhermore, this can help the vendors to do cost saving. Precisely, when the manufacturers have to spend lesser resources on packing, they could invest the money into other sectors like marketing or enhancing the quality of the items. Eventually, lesser focus on product packaging can work in favour of the seller.

On the other hand, accountability of customers in lowering the purchase of packed commodities can also not be overlooked. The contributing factor is environmental concerns. To elaborate, when demand of such articles gets reduced by the public due to its adverse consequences not only on surging the waste production, but also wastage of energy resources to produce packaging articles. The companies will lesser items in packing. Besides, lesser usage of packed products is also benefical for good health. To exaggerate, mostly plastic is used in the packaging of products. Due to, carcinogenic nature of the plastic it must be avoided at al costs. As a result, buyers have to be conscious that packed items are neither ideal for health nor for the environment.

To conclude, I am inclined to believe that purchasing mindfully by the customers can be plausible factor in reduction of packaged items, but participation of sellers is also not ignorable. I reiterate both view points are justifiable.'

instruction: Grading IELTS Writing Task 2 based on 4 criteria: coherence and cohesion, lexical resource, grammatical range, and task achievement.
input:
'Question': 'Many food and drink prodcuts contain high levels of sugar, which causes many health problems. Sugary Products should be made more expensive to encourage people to consume less sugar. Do you agree or disagree?' 
 'Text': 'There are massive products contain high-level of sugars, and these products should be more pricy because it arises health issues, as a result, its usage will decrease. This essay essay will delve into why sugar products should be expensive, along with related examples. 

Firstly, there are many health issues caused by cheaper and unhealthy products which usually contain high level of sugar. If sugary products are expensive, people generally will not buy them. This is because the price is often change customer behaviour, especially if it is expensive. For example, in Mongolia, fruits are expensive, apparently, not everyone cannot afford them. Instead of that most people consume fried dough which contains too much sugar.

Secondly, majority of people do not know about the drawbacks of using too much sweety products. This is because high-level sugar can lead to addiction, such as craving more and more sugar when human organs eat sugar. If individuals had well awared about it, most people would not have comsumed comsumed products. For instance, young generation has becoming well understood the nutrition facts, as it is one part of subject in the secandary school. Consequently, youth generation likely to care their healthy being and fitness rather than previous generation. 

To conclude, sugary products should be expensive, so that customer behaviour will change easily. Many people do not know about negative effect of consuming high-level sugar, so that increase awareness would be one of the important approach, which has already perceived within the youths because of secondary school started to teach this concept.'

instruction: Grading IELTS Writing Task 2 based on 4 criteria: coherence and cohesion, lexical resource, grammatical range, and task achievement.
input:
'Question': 'Tourism is becoming a good source of revenue for many conutries. 

Discuss the advantages and the disadvantages of developing this industry.' 
 'Text': 'In this contemporary world, tourism is one of the major sources of financing in many countries, continuously building up their economies. It is my contention that whilst tourism sector is responsible for the development of countries, it comes along with drawbacks such as pollution, high migration and steep price increases in local markets, making affordable leaving a unviable option for the ingenious people.  

As a salient benefit, undoubtedly, tourisim sector plays a crucial role in the economies' of many countries like Turkey, France and UAE. Surge in tourist numbers creates additional monetary value at the touristic destinations. For example, the tourism alone accounts for 20% of Turkey's entire economy, allowing them to divert these resources to the advancement of other sectors that  fell behind. In order to increase the number of visitors, touristic countries rigorously invest to develop their existing infrastructure as well as enhancing the leaving conditions of its employees. Furthermore, tourism promotes cultural exchange, allowing both visitors and hosts to learn about and appreciate different customs, traditions and ways of life. Resultantly, this mutual comprehension can foster global  connections and goodwill.

Despite these benefits aforementioned above, tourism can also have adverse affects. First of all, as a direct result of tourism, each year many forests, parks and the entire flora and fauna are being destroyed by the increasing number of tourists. Moreover, due to the increased demand in the peak seasons, countries can be overwhelmed, falling short on accommodating tourists. Bearing in mind the influence of seasanality factor on the local markets, especially real-estate prices have been surged drastically, compelling natives to cope with these difficulties. 

while tourism offers a potential avenue for economic growth and cultural interaction, the scope of its drawbacks is expanding to a critical point, leading to significant increase in local markets and environmental pollution.'

instruction: Grading IELTS Writing Task 2 based on 4 criteria: coherence and cohesion, lexical resource, grammatical range, and task achievement.
input:
'Question': 'Many students find it difficult to concentrate or pay attention at school. What are the reasons? What could be done to solve this problem?' 
 'Text': 'Nowadays,several students struggle to focus during class or lose their passion for education. Mainly, that occurs because of two reasons: weakness in the content of studying materials and the unavailability of interesting activities in school. This essay will highlight the reasons for this situation and suggest some practical solutions that might increase the desire for education in students.

Firstly, difficulty concentrating during class refers to a decrease in the attractive topics in the studying materials; therefore, the content of the subjects only includes scientific information; it does not contain different social topics or interesting experiences. Secondly, most schools give priority to education and do not give the same support to other activities such as sports,art,and cooking. To illustrate,the students spend longer hours in class than time in activities. 

It is suggested that the education governments modify the content of subject material by adding topics and experiences that are interesting for the young generation. In addition, the design of the books, including pictures and colors, plays a significant role in attracting students. In other words,the schools should encourage the students to improve their hobbies and obtain many skills by creating a suitable environment and providing all the requirements and tools needed.

To sum up,we could say that students spend long hours in school; therefore, they should receive a high quality of education and improve their personalities at the same time.'

instruction: Grading IELTS Writing Task 2 based on 4 criteria: coherence and cohesion, lexical resource, grammatical range, and task achievement.
input:
'Question': 'The tradition of families getting together to eat meals is disappearing . what are the reasons ?' 
 'Text': 'In recent years , it has been noticed that family members are no longer doing get-togethers as they used to do due to various reasons such as  most individuals they migrated  and  differences in beliefs. However ,  some people  still practice such a culture. In my own opinion , I would say  it is very vital to have  get together as it strengthens the family. This essay will discuss further the reasons .

Nowadays, public are migrating  to other  countries in search of greener pastures , therefore , swallowships are no longer happening . population will opt to send funds to their loved ones during holidays , celebrations and if  there is an emergency  thereby it  will reduce  the costs of transports as well as time  since most of them  will be busy . For example ,  most  Zimbabweans ,  evacuated to   Great Britain in search of jobs , nonetheless ,the distance  is huge approximately 25000 kilometres hence individuals will decide not  to attend family gatherings.

The indifference to cultural beliefs  also contributes to  the disappearance of family meetings  because  family have the human right to believe whatever  religion they would like   to  hence, individuals  have  a variety of cultural faiths for example , christianity , Islam, hindu and  traditional healers . Although it   differs , some family members  will decide not to interact with the opposite ones. For example in Nigeria ,   it has been reported that about  90 per cent of   family members  do not even  communicate because of witchcraft.

   

In conclusion, families  no longer  engage in get-togethers due to various reasons such as  differences in culture  believes  and the migration of society  to other countries . In my own opinion ,  it is  vital to  have  family meetings to a greater extent.'

instruction: Grading IELTS Writing Task 2 based on 4 criteria: coherence and cohesion, lexical resource, grammatical range, and task achievement.
input:
'Question': 'Robots and artifical intelligence are veing developed to replace humans in the workplace. Why is this happen? Do you think this will have a positive or negative impact on society?' 
 'Text': 'In the modern era, man-made and automatic devices are thought to be major in some jobs due to its high tolerance in dangerous situations at work. This phenomenon leads to positives in decease burden on people which can improve the society.

Robots and artificial intelligence now are familiar with society as they are strong and robust. Those machine was made from metal that is tough and strong ingredients can cope well with high and tough working environment. Moreover, those machines can automatically generate actions base on a simple request, without any help. Consequently, robots are potential tools for some jobs requiring strength and tolerate skill to avoid job accidents in humans. For instance, robots are now use in construction sites where they use to carrying heavy packages or working at a high altitude. 

Those robots have improved the public's status by preventing employees from suffering stress in workplace. These devices not only can do heavy jobs but also check the mistake in documents in offices. Using its searching program, artificial intelligent applications are applied to office workers with new ideas or develop their plans for their products. In this way, work place is not a stressful place, forcing employees to generate new ideas and also the products are completely perfect when publicize them. Moreover, reducing stress also help public have better experience in their mental health and their social life. Therefore, robots are the best tool for people, especially in this era when everyone can easily suffer from depression.

In conclusion, automatic automobiles and synthesis intelligence are replacing humans due to their superior ability that bring benefits to a country. Furthermore, this alternative may result in the low depression in people.'

instruction: Grading IELTS Writing Task 2 based on 4 criteria: coherence and cohesion, lexical resource, grammatical range, and task achievement.
input:
'Question': 'Many believe that an effective public transport system is a key component of modern city. What are the advantages and disadvantages of public transport?' 
 'Text': 'It is argued that an effective public transport system is a key featurs of a modern country. This essay state that reduce environment pollution and traffic jam are main advantages while social gartering and lack of time management are the primary disadvantages. 

Firstly,  public transport help to reduce the environment pollution. If the public trasport are available then many people encourage to use this opportunity rather then private transport. For this,  when the amount of car are decreased in number it is possible to reduce the carbon footprint and safe the environment.  For example, research conduct with Social journal media in previous month and they found that the reduced of carbon dieoxide is caused by use private transport.  Furthermore, of the number of private transport  decrease then the traffic jam reduced very early because it occurs when too many vihcles run in one roads and parking road sides. So, it is the primary advantages that if majority of people use the public transport instead public transport, traffic jam and production od carbon dieoxide reduce gradually.

On the other hand, social gattering and the time management are the disadvantages of public transport system. We see a primary example of bad impact of social gattering durion the pendamic in 2020 when the covid19 virus spread by the social gattering extremely.  Not only this,  there are chances to spread other virus disease in public transport as those are too gattering.  Moreover, time management of the public transport are the main issue.   A survey conduct by Star media news channel and most of the passengers said that they often ignore the public transport for poor time management as they use it for their work or office. 

In conclusion, though the reduce of environment pollution and traffic jam is the advantages of public transport the drawbacks are time management and the social gattering which are occur by the public transport system.'

instruction: Grading IELTS Writing Task 2 based on 4 criteria: coherence and cohesion, lexical resource, grammatical range, and task achievement.
input:
'Question': 'Some people say that the main environmental problem of our time is the loss of particular species of plants and animals. Others say that there are more important environmental problems.

Discuss both views and give your own opinion.' 
 'Text': 'The disappearance of various types of plants and animals seem to be the most urgent environmental issues of our society. While some people believe that many other environmental problems are in an emergency to due with.My stance is that biodiversity imbalance is not the most difficult problem of the world and the more important problems such as air pollution is an immediate provision.  

Admittedly, there is evidence suggesting how harm disappearing of several plants and animals is doing to the environment. This can be seen in the extinction of  natural habitats and many animal species due to deforestation and poaching, resulting in the disruption of the balance of nature and destabilization of ecosystems. Such problems, however, are caused by maladroit governments that either overlook the importance of the environment or the repercussions of their inaction because of a thriving economy.Thus, the environment could still be protected if government posed more strictly regulations such as hefty fines, sentenced individuals who break the laws to jails and encouraged organizations and citizens to raise fund open zoo to preserve rare animals or plant more trees.

I am convinced that air pollution in cities is the most urgent threat all over the world. It might be caused by vehicle emission and industrial activities. For example, traffic congestion and the burning of fossil fuels in vehicles release pollutants such as carbon monoxide into the atmosphere. In addition, the process of manufacture and the activity of industry emit pollutants such as sulfur dioxide and nitrogen oxides. These pollutants can,hence, harm the degradation of the environment ,causing climate changes.This is particularly true in the case of our today’s earth where we suffer from various tremendous disasters such as flood, tsunami, earthquake and drought due to climate changes, directly affecting human life.These problems are way far earnest cause the governments can not forbidden people to transporting and halt manufacturing activities cause it will negatively affect the development of the world economy. 

In conclusion, I believe that the urgency of solving the loss of animals and plants to protect the  world’s biodiversity, however, air pollution is more necessary for governments to tackle and to find solutions since it affects human life.'

instruction: Grading IELTS Writing Task 2 based on 4 criteria: coherence and cohesion, lexical resource, grammatical range, and task achievement.
input:
'Question': 'Some people think that strict punishments for driving offences are the key to reducing traffic accidents. Others, however, believe that other measures would be more effective in improving road safety. Discuss both these views and give your own opinion' 
 'Text': 'Some populations believe strict rules while driving are essential in order to rule out accidental crashes on the road while others assume that besides making rules it is way much better to enhance safety while on the road. Personally, I choose to replace road's environmental damage is important to reduce any accidents.

On one hand, strict punishments while driving will allow people to avoid  violations regarding  traffic that eventually can cause harm effects to the surrounding population forward, and building rules to protect the sidewalk will genuinely help them  feel safer while doing their daily activities. Additionally, It will be more advantageous for drivers due to not only building a safe ecosystem for sidewalkers but also they can able to protect themselves from any harmful situation in the road ahead.

On the other hand, Some people tend to pick fixing some roads for safety purposes preferred so much. Having a good facility such as the clear sign for the driver, wider space for sidewalk and driver, and also giving better travel experiences would be a good opportunity to make both of them feel more convenient. Moreover, this effort can reduce the number of traffic

USE SYNONYMS

freightgridlockinfluxmovementserviceshipmenttransittransporttransportationtravel

It is important to use synonyms in your writing, as you will lose marks if you repeat words from the question and use the same words in your essay over and over. If you do that, it will show the examiner that you have a limited vocabulary and you want to do the opposite for a high band score.

 in some areas, particularly in the cities. For instance,  a capital city like Indonesia has tons of traffic everywhere due to a lack of facilities for the driver, however, this could be solved if the government chose to put more attention to improving road safety, also this would be beneficial for the environment in a long term. 

In conclusion, I still stick with the assumption that carrying out changes along the road will be beneficial in the long term instead of stricter rules to drive for people because of reduces traffic in some places and is convenient in some way for each sidewalker or driver. In my opinion, people tend to break the rules especially when they are not really convinced by their way while driving home.'

instruction: Grading IELTS Writing Task 2 based on 4 criteria: coherence and cohesion, lexical resource, grammatical range, and task achievement.
input:
'Question': 'Robots and artificial intelligence are being developed to replace human in the workplaces.Why is this happening? Do you think this will have positive or negative impact on society?' 
 'Text': 'In the modern decades, there is a rise in developing the artificial intelligent and robots which could replace human in the work areas. However, this writer believes that this is a positive change in how people live in the place depend on the robots to do some of dangerous jobs.

It can be known that, machine could have the ability to handle larger workload than the human in some works. On other words, it is able to do the dangerous activities such as in the poisonous or high temperature areas and when they compared to human, they would perform better and more safety in some situations. Not only that, it also can operate for longer hours and could do some with rest for a while much like human. For examples, in some factories robots could do lots of dangerous jobs to create or some specific things for the products that things could replace human in some areas for sure.

Another point to consider is about the unemployment phenomenon, it must be recognized that some jobs could be taken from human that make some of them become unemployed in some case. Moreover, it could make the GDI rate get lower because of less jobs but it also creates higher social standard in human lives.

In conclusions, it could be known that AI and robots have some positives impact on our society of producing products for consumption. However, when the robots develop, it could create the chance of becoming unemployed in the worldwide.'

instruction: Grading IELTS Writing Task 2 based on 4 criteria: coherence and cohesion, lexical resource, grammatical range, and task achievement.
input:
'Question': 'Many museums charge for the entries while others are free. Do you think the advantage of charging people for admission for museum outweigh its disadvantages.' 
 'Text': 'Our heritege, history and pride as as a nation are safely preserved in national museums. However, most of these places are are not accessed for free. The issue of charging entrance fee is debatable. In this essay i will discus positive and negative aspects of charging entrance fee on museums and argue why museums should be free to enter.

On the one hand, every entity requires a source of income for it to run its opperational cost. Museum  is one of them. One; they have workers who tirelesly make sure the place is well taken care of, therefore these workers need renumeration. Two; some museums keep live animals and these animal need food. Furthermore, there are also utility bills and other costs to be covered. All these are good enough reasons to allow museums charge entrance fees as means to finance some of their running expenses.

On the other hand, as a national heritage site, it is grossly irresponsible to allow museums charge entrance fees to its citizens. What is going to happen to those who can not afford it is the biggest question, well, it means they are going to miss out on their greatest opportunity to reconnect with their history. Governments should fund these organisations and allow citzens to enter at free of charge. Moreover, the government should put a law that make foreigners pay to enter in local museums, whereby all local people should produce IDs to enter for free.

In conclusion, it is important to note that museums are very important to educate our community about the local environment whether about the past or present. However, this motive should not be hindered by payment embagoes. All citizens should be allowed to enter free of charge by producing an ID card whereas all foreigners should pay.'

instruction: Grading IELTS Writing Task 2 based on 4 criteria: coherence and cohesion, lexical resource, grammatical range, and task achievement.
input:
'Question': 'Robots and artificial intelligent are being developed to replace human in the workplace.

Why is this happening?

Do you think this will have a positive or negative effect in social' 
 'Text': 'Nowadays, mechanical humanoids and synthetic intelligence are being enhanced to take over people in the work environment. This writer argues that it is important for people to improve work effectiveness and the negative side is being unemployed. It can be understood that mechanical humanoid helps people to improve the quality of work. Nowadays in the digital era, technologies are being improved to the most modern and robots  are not expected. Thanks to effort and available materials, scientists have created robots in  recent years. They did more investigation to find  convenient ways to make humanoids  replace humans and increase the effectiveness of work and the appearance of artificial intelligence can also help humans work out and find more solutions. For instance, robots can help people do some hard work and synthetic intelligence also helps people to calculate and solve problem Another arguments that should be considered is that the replacement of robots will increase unemployment rates. In other words, humans are concerned that artificial intelligent will take over them in the near future, when technologies are more and more developed. It leads to some social tensions such as increasing in criminal rates and social evils appearing more due to unemployment. Therefore, people should consider  the dangerous potential that robots and AI bring. To sum up, there are more negatives than positives in the long run due to those reasons have been laid out above. However, people should also consider  the benefits sides that mechanical humanoids and synthetic intelligence bring.'

instruction: Grading IELTS Writing Task 2 based on 4 criteria: coherence and cohesion, lexical resource, grammatical range, and task achievement.
input:
'Question': 'some people think that exercise is the key to Good health  while others feel that having a balanced diet is more important. Discuss both side and give your opinions' 
 'Text': 'In the modern day, the number of people's getting diseases is increasing rapidly. There are those who argue that the solution to being good health is an exercise, while some people say that the other way is more important as balancing diet. Both viewpoints will be examined throughout this essay.

Indeed, it is quite noticeable that having exercises could bring about numerous benefits. The first and the most obvious reason is the improving heartbeat, due to as a heart is a muscle. Additionally, 

if people exercised in their own right, they would have a greater capacity for the movements of the muscles. Due to this reason that i mentioned, in terms of exercises totally assist people whether sleeping or joint moving, these benefits lead peoplem to prevent unexpected illnesses.

On the other hand, it is better to have a balanced dietary intake than workout for several issues. The initial matter to be mentioned that is the quantity of nutrients, currently numerous people tend to consume more than they need. According to working-aholic habits, this action impacts people's stress levels by eating much without consideration. So, controlling the consumption is less consequence than people worked out because some experts said that 70% of consuming effect and 30% of going through exercises. Hence, the limitation of eating as calorie restriction possible takes advantages as much as possible.

In conclusion, both views have obvious different implications in terms of getting good healthcare outcomes. As a suggestion, the health' experts and administration  should cooperate to ensure the people about how to get longer lives properly and better health outcomes for individuals.'

input:

ry AI and computerization into human lives is limitless. Thanks to the massive growth in computing power and data available, machine learning algorithms have become more sophisticated. The automation of tasks that previously required human harbour would be possible.

instruction: Grading IELTS Writing Task 2 based on 4 criteria: coherence and cohesion, lexical resource, grammatical range, and task achievement.
input:
'Question': 'Robots and artificial intelligence are being developed to replace humans in the workplace. Why is this happening? . Do you think will have a positive of negative impact on society?'

instruction: Grading IELTS Writing Task 2 based on 4 criteria: coherence and cohesion, lexical resource, grammatical range, and task achievement.
input:
'Question': 'More and more people are moving from an agricultural background to relocate to cities in order to look for work .

What will be the consequences of this ? What solutions can you offer?' 
 'Text': 'In modern  era, numerous individuals are Migrating from villages to cities to get work.Hence, majority of villagers are farmers and they care from agricultural background. But, due to reduce numbers in farm workers there are several consequences which are faced by the world .so, some effects of the given view are further discussed in the upcoming paragraphs with valid examples and explanations as well as some solutions to tackle this problem.

Discussing the major effects of the problem, the first and prominent one is that, due to the decrease in number of farmers, production of fruits, vegetables, cereals, and many more essential food to sustain living begins such as humans and animals may dropped down in numbers .As a result, fewer people will get food and also due to the the lack of this resources their price will also rise up significantly. Therefore, people who live in poverty or has very less income won't be able to purchase food and this may led to death of the folks and ever worse they can committes crime such as robbery in order to live and provide food for themselves or their families. Apart from these ,

the notions all over the world may start a war against each other. In this way, a lot number of people will die and numerous countries will be destroyed in order to achieve food from other nations by any methods .Therefore, this con be the consequences of the problem.

However, to tackle this problem the authorities should motivate and spread awarness among farmers. Further, they should provide ransom of money to farm workes, so they will not migrate to other towns to look for work as well as provide best quality of farm equipment with a very little price this will motivate the farmers

in doing farming.

To sum up, there are several consequences such as rise in the price of food products and war against each other by nations if folks from agricultural background drops in number. Hence, the Government must support them by providing various facilities such as increase in their income and discount in farming tools.'

instruction: Grading IELTS Writing Task 2 based on 4 criteria: coherence and cohesion, lexical resource, grammatical range, and task achievement.
input:
'Question': 'Some people believe that politicians are more influential than scientists, whilst others believe that scientists have more influence. Discuss both views and give your opinion.' 
 'Text': 'It is think by some people that politicians are more influential than scientists where other believe that scientists influence more than politicians. This essay elaborate both sides and agree with that scientists are more influential than politician.

Firstly, it is argued that scientists have more influence than other. They are creators in all modern technology, modern science though they have no supernatural power to manipulate people but they influence over us by creating amazing technology. For example, in modern era's children it is a common dream to be a engineer or works on technology,it is a great influenced by the scientist there explored power influence today's young generation. Moreover, almost every ages people do not pass a single moment without scientifical things or gadgets, our society depends on it , so it is also a image of influencers. 

On the other hand, some people think that politician are more influencer than scientists. Though politics leader give speech influence people but they give it particular one group of people not every ages. For example, people of all ages can not allow to participate in votes and they give their speech only one purpose or political related which is influenced one particular group or matured group of people. Furthermore, it is true that politicians have influencer power but it works on those people who are matured enough and understand politics or social rules. 

In conclusion, politicians have influence by their speech or political work one particular group of people while scientists have also influenced people on every ages by their creations and my opinion is scientis are more influence than politicians.'

instruction: Grading IELTS Writing Task 2 based on 4 criteria: coherence and cohesion, lexical resource, grammatical range, and task achievement.
input:
'Question': 'Should wealthy nations be required to share their wealth among poorer nations by providing such things as food and education? or is it the responsibility of the governments of poorer nations to look after their citizens themselves?' 
 'Text': 'People have different views about wealthy share from richest people to poorer society. While there are some benefits high-income families for helping low and middle-income class especially for food and education, I believe the governments should have authority to provide basic needs for society themselves. 

A wealthy family is able to help poorer citizens by providing their money  for essential service such as education and food. For example, they are able to giving scholarship for poorer families through their foundation. Another things richest families can do is by provide basic food for low-income family such as milk, rice, eggs etc that provide several vitamins for their health. The high income family can allocate for example 3-5% from their profit for poorer families. Despite the ability to share weatiness’s families for poorer, I do believe it was not a mandatory things. It would be wise, if helping poorer citizens is a choice not a mandatory.  

However, the one who responsible to ensure basic need for poorer citizens is a governments body. The government has authority to regulate policy that can support poorer citizens to access basic needs. The government also has right to manage nations taxes, which was affected for poorer families. For example, the government have right to increase richest families taxes, and allocate it for meet basic life of society on their nations. The government can held a program that pro with poorer citizens by giving, for example, free tuition fees for all poorer families in all degree of education and others social assistance programs that increase wellbeing life.   

To sump up, helping poorer family is a choice for richest family - not a mandatory. However, government, with all authorities that they have, responsible or required to fulfill all basic needs for their poorer citizens.'

instruction: Grading IELTS Writing Task 2 based on 4 criteria: coherence and cohesion, lexical resource, grammatical range, and task achievement.
input:
'Question': 'Blood sports have become a hot topic for debate in recent years. As society develops it is increasingly seen as an uncivilized activity and caused to helpless animals that are killed. All blood sports should be banned. Discuss the main arguments for this statement \u0026 give your opinion' 
 'Text': 'Sports which involve animals were quite popular in the ancient times. It is a debtable topic that society considers bloodsports a cruel act as animals are harmed and killed just for the sake of entertainment. So it is suggested that a complete ban should be imposed on this activity. Well, I personally believe this given viewpoint and this essay will highlight the backing reasons in the subsequent paragraphs.

The foremost reason why animal sports should be banned is that animals have the right to live on the earth. In the past times, this activity was extremely popular among royalities to showcase their power and competitions for bull fighting had been held between various groups which led to lots of blood shed among animals. Even if, many people were concerned about this act but kings and princes of those times were not willing to leave this sport and eventually animals would slowly gave up on life while enduring pain during the competitions. Thus, bloodsports are not only against the rights of animals but also its highly painful for the innocent creatures so it should be banned properly.

Many birds which are involved in the game are on the verge of extinction is the another reason why such sport events should be prohibited. In London, the famous sport was to hung the bird on rope and the king while riding on the horse would snatch the hanging bird but this activity led to the extinction of some birds such as goose. Also, extensive fishing has elevated the risk of extinction of some fish species which in turn will disturb the life cycle of the earth. Therefore, the more the control on these sports, the lesser the birds and aquatic animals would disappear.

To conclude, it can be inferred that no doubt, blood sports is a uncultured act of the society. Nonetheless, animals have equal rights as of humans to live on this earth and the endangered species can be saved by blocking this sports so that these creatures could be saved.'

instruction: Grading IELTS Writing Task 2 based on 4 criteria: coherence and cohesion, lexical resource, grammatical range, and task achievement.
input:
'Question': 'Some people think that video games are advantages while others believe video games are harmful to the people who play them. I would argue that video game my give the negative effect' 
 'Text': 'IN RECENT YEARS, TECHNOGOLGY HAS BEEN BECOMING MORE POPULAR AMONG INDIVIDIALS. FOR SOME REASON, VIDEO GAMES BECOME PART OF OUR LIVES AND PEOPLE ARGUE ABOUT THE HARM OF VIDEO GAMES. IN MY OPINION THE NEGATIVE EFFECT CAN OUTWEIGH THE POSITIVE ONES. HOWEVER.THIS ESSAY WILL DISCUSS BOTH SIDES OF VIDEO GAMES AND TRY TO DRAW A CONCLUSION. 

FIRST OF ALL, IN HIGH TECHNOLOGY AND TECHNIQUES OF VIDEO GAMES ARE INCREASING DRAMATICALLY. VIDEO GAMES CREATORS CAN CREATE AN AMAZING GAMES THAT PUBLIC TEND TO ADDICT. SPEACIALLY, OVER HALF OF THE USER IS CHILDREN. DUE TO VIDEO GAMES ADDICTION, CHILDREN CAN NOT CONTROL THEIR FEELINGS OR SPEND THEIR FREETIME PRODUCTIVE. THEY ARE SITTING BEHIND THEIR TABLE FOR A LOT OF TIME JUST PLAYING GAMES. WHEN CHILDREN ARE TOO ADDICTED VIDEO GAMES, PARENTS DO NOT KNOW HOW TO STOP THEM. IN ADDITION TO THIS, MOST IMPORTANTLY, PARENTS SHOULD KNOW THAT THEIR CHILDREN PLAYING. FUTHERMORE THEY CAN PREVENT RISKS OR ANY BAD HABITS. ON THE INTERNET THERE ARE HUGE EFFECTIVENESS OF VIDEO GAMES. THERE ARE VARIOUS TYPES OF GAMES. MOST LIKELY, YOUNG CHILDREN LIKE TO PLAY KILLING GAMES BECAUSE GETTING A SATISFACTION THEY NEVER HAD IN THEIR REAL LIFE. AS THE DAMAGE OF KILLING GAMES, ADDICTED CHILDREN LIKE TO PLAY REAL KNIVES OR GUNS THEREFORE THERE IS HIGH CHANCE OF COMMITTING A CRIME ACCIDENTALLY. 

TURNING TO THE OTHER SIDE OF THE ARGMENT, E-SPORT IS ONE OF THE SPORTS THAT PARENTS HAVE TO ALLOW. ALL AROUND THE WORLD THERE ARE TONS OF CHILDREN WHO ARE GETTING MONEY FOR PLAYING VIDEO GAMES. ONE OF THEM HAS BECOME A BILLIONARE. THEY ARE PLAYING VIDEO GAMES AND STREAMING IT THROUGH THE YOUTUBE, AND GETTING DONATIONS FOR THEIR FANS. SO THAT, IT IS A ONE WAY OF MAKING MONEY EASILY.  ANOTHER ADVANTAGE OF PLAYING VIDEO GAMES IS NETWORKING WITH FOREIGN PEOPLE. THUS, WHEN THEY ARE PLAYING THEY CAN ALSO LEARN NEW LANGUAGES OR NEW SKILLS AT THE SAME TIME. 

IN CONCLUSION, VIDEO GAMES ARE REALLY FUN TO RELIEVE STRESS AND DEPRESSION, BUT IF PUBLIC GET ADDICTED TO MUCH AS WELL AS THEY CAN GET STRESSED AND DEPRESSED BECAUSE OF THEIR SURRENDER. IN MYB VIEW OF THIS POINT, CHILDREN AND PARENTS HAVE TO KNOW THEIR LIMITS OF PLAYING VIDEO GAMES UNLESS THEY WILL GET IN BIG TROUBLE. ALL CHILDREN ARE IMPOSIBBLE TO BECOME A BILLIONARE OR FIND A COST OF LIVING JUST PLAYING VIDEO GAMES.'

instruction: Grading IELTS Writing Task 2 based on 4 criteria: coherence and cohesion, lexical resource, grammatical range, and task achievement.
input:
'Question': 'In many countries, smoking is now illegal in public places. Many people believe that such a ban is justified.

Do you agree or disagree?' 
 'Text': 'Publicly smoking is ban in many countries as it is not legal. This essay completely agree with this statement because publicly smoking effects other health besides the smoker and children may attract on this if adult people smoke toward them.

Firstly, smoking not only effect a smokers health but also other peoples besides him. Though a smoker affected by many health problems but this problem is as same as for other people indirectly. For example, a general statement we always see that smoking is injuries to health . It mainly damaged the lungs especially a smokers and a children's lung. Moreover, if anyone smoke toward other people though it is normal for a smoker and few person but it may disappointed for others and many suffers from azma, oxygen problems and other diseases.

Furthermore, children may attract by a smoker to smoking. As everyone know that children reveals their curiosity for a thing very early and attract soon. So , if anyone especially adults smoke in front of them , they may question about it , they being intersted what thing is it and by this smoking attracted the children which does not give good impact in our next generation. For example, if parents smoke toward their baby , they learn it from their parents and compare it as a normal or good thing because children always follow their parents.

In conclusion, the decision compare as a good and I agree with this because by ban publicly smoking children do not attract in it besides smoking effects everyone's health which is decreased now.'

instruction: Grading IELTS Writing Task 2 based on 4 criteria: coherence and cohesion, lexical resource, grammatical range, and task achievement.
input:
'Question': 'Some people argue that all experimentation on animals is bad and should be outlawed. However, others believe that important scientific discoveries can be made from animal experiments.

Can experimentation on animals be justified? Are there any alternatives?

Give reasons for your answer and include any relevant examples from your own knowledge and experience.' 
 'Text': 'Experimentation is part of innovation. There are those who believe that experimentation on animals are not good and ought to be fines by law while others believe that these experimentation on animals are crucial in science development. In my opinion, It is vital to use animals as expirement for the benefit of science for humankind but with limitation.

Firstly, it is more easy to do experimentation on animals than humans because there many different species and sizes to chose from. For example, from the small lab rat to big chimpanzee. These are important in making discoveries for the future of humankind. Although, these should be doing in limitation and in humane as much as possible to prevent extinction of certain species of animals.

Secondly, almost animals have the same vital organs with mankind, so it is really helpful to utilize animals in experimentation. For instance the chimpanzees, these creature have been known to have more intelligent than other animals. This way helps scientist to study psychology much better in order to aid humankind self destruction and develop self evaluation.

Lastly, it is not bad to use animals in experimentation as long as it will not cause harm to all kinds of animal species For example, there are scientist for drugs innovation, they utilize animals first for the drugs they create before human consume it. The animals they use should be in one species in order not to spread the disease of somekind.

In summary, the use of animals in science development is still important because these animals help humankind sustain.'

instruction: Grading IELTS Writing Task 2 based on 4 criteria: coherence and cohesion, lexical resource, grammatical range, and task achievement.
input:
'Question': 'In some parts of the world it is increasingly popular to research the history of one's own family. Why do people want to do this? Is it a positive or negative development?' 
 'Text': 'Nowadays, the analysis in the history of one’s own family are becoming prevalent among several regions in the worlds. In this essay I will outline some reasons for this phenomenon and discuss both views of this development.

There are some reasons why people interested in discovering their family’s history. The most popular reason is that they are just curious about who their ancestors were and what things they did for society. For instance, it would be fascinating when find out a general in army was a member of their family. This kind of information can make people become proud of their origins. In addtion, many people research about history of their family because this activity would serve medical purposes, that could give them a hand to be aware of diseases inherit from their relatives. 

This tendency might be bring benefits if your ancestors were a good person. However, it could be not necessary for people as it could be a waste of time and money, even some informations related to health care seem not to be significant advantages. Therefore, they should focus more on some methods which could cure for them. Moreover, the data on their ancestors might have negative effect on their attitude in life. Take a person who are a criminal as an example, that would make their young generations can not be proud and lose their confidences.  

 

In conclusion, the reasons of researches in family histories such as need to know their ancestors and serving for curing some diseases. And in my perspective, I think it will be a unfavourable development.'

instruction: Grading IELTS Writing Task 2 based on 4 criteria: coherence and cohesion, lexical resource, grammatical range, and task achievement.
input:
'Question': 'Write about the following topic: Many people go through life doing work that they hate or have no talent for. Why does this happen? What are the consequences of this situation?' 
 'Text': 'The majority of people choose to take jobs though they have not passions or interests on those. This caused by several factor that mostly coming from economic conditions. If this condition last long, they will not show their 100% capabilities. Government and ourself have to work together to address this problem. 

Nowadays find a jobs for a fresh graduated is very hard. Even though they had an bachelor degree or master degree, many companies prefer to choose skilled workers that did not have diploma. The main reasons is companies can paid them under the wage. Sometimes the employe candidate lower their expectation salary to gain experience first. Additionaly, profession field in dream job is running out while life is keep running, we have to work to get money for survive.

We can be more wise before we choose profession for our career. Look our capabilites and passions about the job in the internet and asks some friends are also needed, so we are not regret in the last. Authorities can take part to solve this problem. They can provide special rules that control the worker talents. For example, Indonesia administrator have been obliged the national or private company to talent mapping so the would keep the track if they like or do not like the job.

In conclusion, searching for a job is a difficult thing in this conditon. In the other hand, you must choose a job that would matched with our passion. From ourself, we can do study about the job candidate before we applied. Government also must supported the worker by provide some rules.'

instruction: Grading IELTS Writing Task 2 based on 4 criteria: coherence and cohesion, lexical resource, grammatical range, and task achievement.
input:
'Question': 'In many developing countries, there is a problem with declining Quality of water and air from both industry and construction. What measures could be takenTo prevent this?' 
 'Text': 'Mandy developing nations facing challenging to maintain good quality of natural resources such as water and air from both industry as well as construction. In order to improve the quality ,government should spend funds in the environment program and building factories in the right place. I will explain my points in the following paragraphs.

The first measure that government should be taken to grow more trees around cities because due to industralization , many trees has been cutting and using as a fuel for development .This rising the depletion of ozone layer and increasing the harmful gases in the air . These harmful gases result in bad quality of the air and shows deterimental impact on the human bodies too . Therefore , creating environment programs which involves  planting a large amount of trees in order to give fresh air and sufficient amount of oxyzen will definately helps in the quality of air . For example , when industralization happened in the china then government initiate the project name \'

instruction: Grading IELTS Writing Task 2 based on 4 criteria: coherence and cohesion, lexical resource, grammatical range, and task achievement.
input:
'Question': 'It is better to run your own business than to work for someone else. 

To what extent do yo agree or disagree?' 
 'Text': 'Entrepernurs are arising in the upcoming years as small industries raising with it. Some people believe that its is a good model to act as it provides freedom and somethig of your own. However, the risk factor is involved in the growth veruses, a employee in multi-national company where benifits are given . In my persespective, intrest a one well-being involving the factors can consider the suitable type.

      To commence with, Businesses carries many factors which have prons and cons. it depends upon the personaility of an individual which sector they wants to pursue their carrer in. For instance, being a entrepernur gives the ability to work in  flexibile timings. In additon to this, while runing a own buissness a person starts taking risk which may result in a growth in income and investing time in developing your trade results secured future. Moreover, its provides freedom which is not accompanied while working for a company. As an employee one always has to follow the rules and regulations of that firm which bound a employee to fly thier wings. Furthrermore, another thing is if are person puts hundered percent, but an employee may not. For instance, one of my close frend kiran owns a resturant on new year they were busy, but they were short staffed, although she was the owner of various resturants, she did not hesitated to join the team and mantained the productivity for their guests.

        Working in a big firm brings employement benifits as dental and health services. Employee only concerened to their job in working hours whereas in buisness is tweenty four seven. Jobs provides you a promotion for better work enhances positon security. As employed you can ask for vacations without stressing about the work load. It provides you work life balance and a dedicated time to spend with family. Not only this being employed, sick leaves are also covered. For Instance. my collegue was experiencing some health issues, crtain days of her leave was paid by the company.

    To Conclude with, every person has different working ethices which results in to choose their carrer.

Business comes with high income along with great risk. On the other hand, job provides a work life balance under rule and regulations.'

instruction: Grading IELTS Writing Task 2 based on 4 criteria: coherence and cohesion, lexical resource, grammatical range, and task achievement.
input:
